					value = scope:target.var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_moroccan_dirham_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_dinar_moroccan_dirham_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_moroccan_dirham_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_order
				#Player country quantity of dinar_moroccan_dirham buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_moroccan_dirham_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_order = 1
				var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_sell_1 #Player country quantity of dinar_moroccan_dirham sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_sell_1 #Player country quantity of dinar_moroccan_dirham sell
					value  = var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_moroccan_dirham_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_dinar_moroccan_dirham_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_moroccan_dirham_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_order = 2
				var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_sell_2 #Player country quantity of dinar_moroccan_dirham sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_sell_2 #Player country quantity of dinar_moroccan_dirham sell
					value  = var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_moroccan_dirham_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_dinar_moroccan_dirham_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_moroccan_dirham_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_order = 3
				var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_sell_3 #Player country quantity of dinar_moroccan_dirham sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_sell_3 #Player country quantity of dinar_moroccan_dirham sell
					value  = var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_moroccan_dirham_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_dinar_moroccan_dirham_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_moroccan_dirham_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_order = 4
				var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_sell_4 #Player country quantity of dinar_moroccan_dirham sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_sell_4 #Player country quantity of dinar_moroccan_dirham sell
					value  = var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_moroccan_dirham_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_dinar_moroccan_dirham_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_moroccan_dirham_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_order = 5
				var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_sell_5 #Player country quantity of dinar_moroccan_dirham sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_sell_5 #Player country quantity of dinar_moroccan_dirham sell
					value  = var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_moroccan_dirham_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_dinar_moroccan_dirham_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_moroccan_dirham_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_order
				#Player country quantity of dinar_moroccan_dirham sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_dinar_moroccan_dirham_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity < stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_dinar_moroccan_dirham_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_dinar_moroccan_dirham > 0

	}
}
sell_dinar_moroccan_dirham_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity < player.stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_dinar_moroccan_dirham_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_dinar_moroccan_dirham > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
dinar_moroccan_dirham_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_dinar_moroccan_dirham
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_dinar_moroccan_dirham
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
dinar_moroccan_dirham_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_dinar_moroccan_dirham
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
						add = owner.var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_dinar_moroccan_dirham

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#dinar_omanian_rial
dinar_omanian_rial_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
				#var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state
				#var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
dinar_omanian_rial_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
				var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_dinar_omanian_rial_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state > player.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity

		money_supply_verification_dinar_omanian_rial < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_dinar_omanian_rial_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_omanian_rial_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state > player.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_dinar_omanian_rial_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_dinar_omanian_rial_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_dinar_omanian_rial_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_dinar_omanian_rial_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:dinar_omanian_rial_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = dinar_omanian_rial_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_omanian_rial_order = 1
				var:dinar_omanian_rial_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_sell_1 #Player country quantity of dinar_omanian_rial buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_buy_1 #Player country quantity of dinar_omanian_rial buy
					value  = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_omanian_rial_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_dinar_omanian_rial_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_omanian_rial_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_omanian_rial_order = 2
				var:dinar_omanian_rial_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_sell_2 #Player country quantity of dinar_omanian_rial buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_buy_2 #Player country quantity of dinar_omanian_rial buy
					value  = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_omanian_rial_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_dinar_omanian_rial_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_omanian_rial_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_omanian_rial_order = 3
				var:dinar_omanian_rial_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_sell_3 #Player country quantity of dinar_omanian_rial buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_buy_3 #Player country quantity of dinar_omanian_rial buy
					value  = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_omanian_rial_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_dinar_omanian_rial_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_omanian_rial_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_omanian_rial_order = 4
				var:dinar_omanian_rial_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_sell_4 #Player country quantity of dinar_omanian_rial buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_buy_4 #Player country quantity of dinar_omanian_rial buy
					value  = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_omanian_rial_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_dinar_omanian_rial_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_omanian_rial_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_omanian_rial_order = 5
				var:dinar_omanian_rial_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_sell_5 #Player country quantity of dinar_omanian_rial buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_buy_5 #Player country quantity of dinar_omanian_rial buy
					value  = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_omanian_rial_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_dinar_omanian_rial_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_omanian_rial_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_omanian_rial_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = dinar_omanian_rial_order
				#Player country quantity of dinar_omanian_rial buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_omanian_rial_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:dinar_omanian_rial_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = dinar_omanian_rial_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_omanian_rial_order = 1
				var:dinar_omanian_rial_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_sell_1 #Player country quantity of dinar_omanian_rial sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_sell_1 #Player country quantity of dinar_omanian_rial sell
					value  = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_omanian_rial_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_dinar_omanian_rial_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_omanian_rial_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_omanian_rial_order = 2
				var:dinar_omanian_rial_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_sell_2 #Player country quantity of dinar_omanian_rial sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_sell_2 #Player country quantity of dinar_omanian_rial sell
					value  = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_omanian_rial_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_dinar_omanian_rial_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_omanian_rial_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_omanian_rial_order = 3
				var:dinar_omanian_rial_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_sell_3 #Player country quantity of dinar_omanian_rial sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_sell_3 #Player country quantity of dinar_omanian_rial sell
					value  = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_omanian_rial_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_dinar_omanian_rial_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_omanian_rial_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_omanian_rial_order = 4
				var:dinar_omanian_rial_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_sell_4 #Player country quantity of dinar_omanian_rial sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_sell_4 #Player country quantity of dinar_omanian_rial sell
					value  = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_omanian_rial_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_dinar_omanian_rial_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_omanian_rial_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_omanian_rial_order = 5
				var:dinar_omanian_rial_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_sell_5 #Player country quantity of dinar_omanian_rial sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_sell_5 #Player country quantity of dinar_omanian_rial sell
					value  = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_omanian_rial_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_omanian_rial_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_dinar_omanian_rial_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_omanian_rial_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_omanian_rial_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = dinar_omanian_rial_order
				#Player country quantity of dinar_omanian_rial sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_dinar_omanian_rial_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity < stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_dinar_omanian_rial_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_dinar_omanian_rial > 0

	}
}
sell_dinar_omanian_rial_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity < player.stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_dinar_omanian_rial_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_dinar_omanian_rial > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
dinar_omanian_rial_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_dinar_omanian_rial
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_dinar_omanian_rial
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
dinar_omanian_rial_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_dinar_omanian_rial
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
						add = owner.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_dinar_omanian_rial

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#dinar_qiran
dinar_qiran_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = dinar_qiran_quantity
				#var:dinar_qiran_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state
				#var:dinar_qiran_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:dinar_qiran_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = dinar_qiran_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
dinar_qiran_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = dinar_qiran_quantity
				var:dinar_qiran_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = dinar_qiran_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_dinar_qiran_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state > player.var:dinar_qiran_quantity

		money_supply_verification_dinar_qiran < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:dinar_qiran_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_dinar_qiran_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_qiran_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state > player.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_dinar_qiran_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_dinar_qiran_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_dinar_qiran_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_dinar_qiran_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:dinar_qiran_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = dinar_qiran_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_qiran_order = 1
				var:dinar_qiran_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_sell_1 #Player country quantity of dinar_qiran buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_buy_1 #Player country quantity of dinar_qiran buy
					value  = var:dinar_qiran_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_qiran_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_qiran_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_dinar_qiran_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_qiran_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_qiran_order = 2
				var:dinar_qiran_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_sell_2 #Player country quantity of dinar_qiran buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_buy_2 #Player country quantity of dinar_qiran buy
					value  = var:dinar_qiran_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_qiran_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_qiran_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_dinar_qiran_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_qiran_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_qiran_order = 3
				var:dinar_qiran_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_sell_3 #Player country quantity of dinar_qiran buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_buy_3 #Player country quantity of dinar_qiran buy
					value  = var:dinar_qiran_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_qiran_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_qiran_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_dinar_qiran_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_qiran_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_qiran_order = 4
				var:dinar_qiran_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_sell_4 #Player country quantity of dinar_qiran buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_buy_4 #Player country quantity of dinar_qiran buy
					value  = var:dinar_qiran_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_qiran_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_qiran_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_dinar_qiran_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_qiran_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_qiran_order = 5
				var:dinar_qiran_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_sell_5 #Player country quantity of dinar_qiran buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_buy_5 #Player country quantity of dinar_qiran buy
					value  = var:dinar_qiran_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_qiran_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_qiran_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_dinar_qiran_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_qiran_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_qiran_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = dinar_qiran_order
				#Player country quantity of dinar_qiran buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_qiran_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:dinar_qiran_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = dinar_qiran_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_qiran_order = 1
				var:dinar_qiran_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_sell_1 #Player country quantity of dinar_qiran sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_sell_1 #Player country quantity of dinar_qiran sell
					value  = var:dinar_qiran_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_qiran_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_qiran_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_dinar_qiran_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_qiran_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_qiran_order = 2
				var:dinar_qiran_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_sell_2 #Player country quantity of dinar_qiran sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_sell_2 #Player country quantity of dinar_qiran sell
					value  = var:dinar_qiran_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_qiran_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_qiran_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_dinar_qiran_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_qiran_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_qiran_order = 3
				var:dinar_qiran_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_sell_3 #Player country quantity of dinar_qiran sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_sell_3 #Player country quantity of dinar_qiran sell
					value  = var:dinar_qiran_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_qiran_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_qiran_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_dinar_qiran_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_qiran_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_qiran_order = 4
				var:dinar_qiran_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_sell_4 #Player country quantity of dinar_qiran sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_sell_4 #Player country quantity of dinar_qiran sell
					value  = var:dinar_qiran_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_qiran_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_qiran_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_dinar_qiran_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_qiran_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_qiran_order = 5
				var:dinar_qiran_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_sell_5 #Player country quantity of dinar_qiran sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_sell_5 #Player country quantity of dinar_qiran sell
					value  = var:dinar_qiran_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_qiran_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_qiran_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_qiran_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_dinar_qiran_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_qiran_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_qiran_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = dinar_qiran_order
				#Player country quantity of dinar_qiran sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_dinar_qiran_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:dinar_qiran_quantity < stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_dinar_qiran_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_dinar_qiran > 0

	}
}
sell_dinar_qiran_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:dinar_qiran_quantity < player.stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_dinar_qiran_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_dinar_qiran > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
dinar_qiran_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_dinar_qiran
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_dinar_qiran
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
dinar_qiran_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_dinar_qiran
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
						add = owner.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:dinar_qiran_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_dinar_qiran

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#dinar_saudi_riyal
dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity
				#var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state
				#var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity
				var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_dinar_saudi_riyal_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state > player.var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity

		money_supply_verification_dinar_saudi_riyal < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_dinar_saudi_riyal_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_saudi_riyal_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state > player.var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_dinar_saudi_riyal_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_dinar_saudi_riyal_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_dinar_saudi_riyal_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_dinar_saudi_riyal_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:dinar_saudi_riyal_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = dinar_saudi_riyal_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_saudi_riyal_order = 1
				var:dinar_saudi_riyal_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_sell_1 #Player country quantity of dinar_saudi_riyal buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_buy_1 #Player country quantity of dinar_saudi_riyal buy
					value  = var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_saudi_riyal_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_saudi_riyal_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_saudi_riyal_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_dinar_saudi_riyal_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_saudi_riyal_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_saudi_riyal_order = 2
				var:dinar_saudi_riyal_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_sell_2 #Player country quantity of dinar_saudi_riyal buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_buy_2 #Player country quantity of dinar_saudi_riyal buy
					value  = var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_saudi_riyal_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_saudi_riyal_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_saudi_riyal_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_dinar_saudi_riyal_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_saudi_riyal_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_saudi_riyal_order = 3
				var:dinar_saudi_riyal_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_sell_3 #Player country quantity of dinar_saudi_riyal buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_buy_3 #Player country quantity of dinar_saudi_riyal buy
					value  = var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_saudi_riyal_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_saudi_riyal_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_saudi_riyal_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_dinar_saudi_riyal_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_saudi_riyal_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_saudi_riyal_order = 4
				var:dinar_saudi_riyal_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_sell_4 #Player country quantity of dinar_saudi_riyal buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_buy_4 #Player country quantity of dinar_saudi_riyal buy
					value  = var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_saudi_riyal_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_saudi_riyal_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity
							multiply = var:dinar_saudi_riyal_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_dinar_saudi_riyal_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dinar_saudi_riyal_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dinar_saudi_riyal_order = 5
				var:dinar_saudi_riyal_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_sell_5 #Player country quantity of dinar_saudi_riyal buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_buy_5 #Player country quantity of dinar_saudi_riyal buy
					value  = var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:dinar_saudi_riyal_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to dinar_saudi_riyal_suply
				set_variable = {
