					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_east_african_eco_order = 3
				var:eco_east_african_eco_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_east_african_eco_sell_3 #Player country quantity of eco_east_african_eco sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_east_african_eco_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_east_african_eco_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_east_african_eco_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_east_african_eco_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_east_african_eco_sell_3 #Player country quantity of eco_east_african_eco sell
					value  = var:eco_east_african_eco_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_east_african_eco_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:eco_east_african_eco_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_east_african_eco_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_east_african_eco_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_east_african_eco_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_east_african_eco_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_eco_east_african_eco_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_east_african_eco_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_east_african_eco_order = 4
				var:eco_east_african_eco_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_east_african_eco_sell_4 #Player country quantity of eco_east_african_eco sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_east_african_eco_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_east_african_eco_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_east_african_eco_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_east_african_eco_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_east_african_eco_sell_4 #Player country quantity of eco_east_african_eco sell
					value  = var:eco_east_african_eco_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_east_african_eco_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:eco_east_african_eco_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_east_african_eco_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_east_african_eco_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_east_african_eco_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_east_african_eco_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_eco_east_african_eco_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_east_african_eco_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_east_african_eco_order = 5
				var:eco_east_african_eco_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_east_african_eco_sell_5 #Player country quantity of eco_east_african_eco sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_east_african_eco_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_east_african_eco_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_east_african_eco_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_east_african_eco_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_east_african_eco_sell_5 #Player country quantity of eco_east_african_eco sell
					value  = var:eco_east_african_eco_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_east_african_eco_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:eco_east_african_eco_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_east_african_eco_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_east_african_eco_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_east_african_eco_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_east_african_eco_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_eco_east_african_eco_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_east_african_eco_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_east_african_eco_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = eco_east_african_eco_order
				#Player country quantity of eco_east_african_eco sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_eco_east_african_eco_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:eco_east_african_eco_quantity < stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_eco_east_african_eco_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_eco_east_african_eco > 0

	}
}
sell_eco_east_african_eco_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:eco_east_african_eco_quantity < player.stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_eco_east_african_eco_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_eco_east_african_eco > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_eco_east_african_eco_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_east_african_eco_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
eco_east_african_eco_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:eco_east_african_eco_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:eco_east_african_eco_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_eco_east_african_eco
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:eco_east_african_eco_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:eco_east_african_eco_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_eco_east_african_eco
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
eco_east_african_eco_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:eco_east_african_eco_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:eco_east_african_eco_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_eco_east_african_eco
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1
						add = owner.var:eco_east_african_eco_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:eco_east_african_eco_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_eco_east_african_eco

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#eco_ethiopian_birr
eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
				#var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state
				#var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
				var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_eco_ethiopian_birr_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state > player.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity

		money_supply_verification_eco_ethiopian_birr < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_eco_ethiopian_birr_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_eco_ethiopian_birr_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state > player.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_eco_ethiopian_birr_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_eco_ethiopian_birr_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_eco_ethiopian_birr_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_eco_ethiopian_birr_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:eco_ethiopian_birr_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = eco_ethiopian_birr_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_ethiopian_birr_order = 1
				var:eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_1 #Player country quantity of eco_ethiopian_birr buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_buy_1 #Player country quantity of eco_ethiopian_birr buy
					value  = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_ethiopian_birr_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_eco_ethiopian_birr_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_ethiopian_birr_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_ethiopian_birr_order = 2
				var:eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_2 #Player country quantity of eco_ethiopian_birr buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_buy_2 #Player country quantity of eco_ethiopian_birr buy
					value  = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_ethiopian_birr_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_eco_ethiopian_birr_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_ethiopian_birr_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_ethiopian_birr_order = 3
				var:eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_3 #Player country quantity of eco_ethiopian_birr buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_buy_3 #Player country quantity of eco_ethiopian_birr buy
					value  = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_ethiopian_birr_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_eco_ethiopian_birr_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_ethiopian_birr_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_ethiopian_birr_order = 4
				var:eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_4 #Player country quantity of eco_ethiopian_birr buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_buy_4 #Player country quantity of eco_ethiopian_birr buy
					value  = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_ethiopian_birr_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_eco_ethiopian_birr_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_ethiopian_birr_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_ethiopian_birr_order = 5
				var:eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_5 #Player country quantity of eco_ethiopian_birr buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_buy_5 #Player country quantity of eco_ethiopian_birr buy
					value  = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_ethiopian_birr_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_eco_ethiopian_birr_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_ethiopian_birr_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_ethiopian_birr_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = eco_ethiopian_birr_order
				#Player country quantity of eco_ethiopian_birr buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_eco_ethiopian_birr_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = eco_ethiopian_birr_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_ethiopian_birr_order = 1
				var:eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_1 #Player country quantity of eco_ethiopian_birr sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_1 #Player country quantity of eco_ethiopian_birr sell
					value  = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_ethiopian_birr_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_eco_ethiopian_birr_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_ethiopian_birr_order = 2
				var:eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_2 #Player country quantity of eco_ethiopian_birr sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_2 #Player country quantity of eco_ethiopian_birr sell
					value  = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_ethiopian_birr_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_eco_ethiopian_birr_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_ethiopian_birr_order = 3
				var:eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_3 #Player country quantity of eco_ethiopian_birr sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_3 #Player country quantity of eco_ethiopian_birr sell
					value  = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_ethiopian_birr_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_eco_ethiopian_birr_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_ethiopian_birr_order = 4
				var:eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_4 #Player country quantity of eco_ethiopian_birr sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_4 #Player country quantity of eco_ethiopian_birr sell
					value  = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_ethiopian_birr_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_eco_ethiopian_birr_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_ethiopian_birr_order = 5
				var:eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_5 #Player country quantity of eco_ethiopian_birr sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_5 #Player country quantity of eco_ethiopian_birr sell
					value  = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_ethiopian_birr_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ethiopian_birr_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_ethiopian_birr_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_eco_ethiopian_birr_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_ethiopian_birr_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = eco_ethiopian_birr_order
				#Player country quantity of eco_ethiopian_birr sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_eco_ethiopian_birr_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity < stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_eco_ethiopian_birr_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_eco_ethiopian_birr > 0

	}
}
sell_eco_ethiopian_birr_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity < player.stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_eco_ethiopian_birr_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_eco_ethiopian_birr > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_eco_ethiopian_birr_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ethiopian_birr_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_eco_ethiopian_birr
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_eco_ethiopian_birr
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
eco_ethiopian_birr_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_eco_ethiopian_birr
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state_1
						add = owner.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:eco_ethiopian_birr_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_eco_ethiopian_birr

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#eco_ghanaian_pound
eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
				#var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state
				#var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
				var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_eco_ghanaian_pound_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state > player.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity

		money_supply_verification_eco_ghanaian_pound < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_eco_ghanaian_pound_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_eco_ghanaian_pound_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state > player.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_eco_ghanaian_pound_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_eco_ghanaian_pound_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_eco_ghanaian_pound_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_eco_ghanaian_pound_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:eco_ghanaian_pound_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = eco_ghanaian_pound_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_ghanaian_pound_order = 1
				var:eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_1 #Player country quantity of eco_ghanaian_pound buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_buy_1 #Player country quantity of eco_ghanaian_pound buy
					value  = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_ghanaian_pound_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_eco_ghanaian_pound_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_ghanaian_pound_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_ghanaian_pound_order = 2
				var:eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_2 #Player country quantity of eco_ghanaian_pound buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_buy_2 #Player country quantity of eco_ghanaian_pound buy
					value  = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_ghanaian_pound_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_eco_ghanaian_pound_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_ghanaian_pound_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_ghanaian_pound_order = 3
				var:eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_3 #Player country quantity of eco_ghanaian_pound buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_buy_3 #Player country quantity of eco_ghanaian_pound buy
					value  = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_ghanaian_pound_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_eco_ghanaian_pound_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_ghanaian_pound_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_ghanaian_pound_order = 4
				var:eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_4 #Player country quantity of eco_ghanaian_pound buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_buy_4 #Player country quantity of eco_ghanaian_pound buy
					value  = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_ghanaian_pound_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_eco_ghanaian_pound_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_ghanaian_pound_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_ghanaian_pound_order = 5
				var:eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_5 #Player country quantity of eco_ghanaian_pound buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_buy_5 #Player country quantity of eco_ghanaian_pound buy
					value  = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_ghanaian_pound_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_eco_ghanaian_pound_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_ghanaian_pound_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_ghanaian_pound_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = eco_ghanaian_pound_order
				#Player country quantity of eco_ghanaian_pound buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_eco_ghanaian_pound_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = eco_ghanaian_pound_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_ghanaian_pound_order = 1
				var:eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_1 #Player country quantity of eco_ghanaian_pound sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_1 #Player country quantity of eco_ghanaian_pound sell
					value  = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_ghanaian_pound_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_eco_ghanaian_pound_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_ghanaian_pound_order = 2
				var:eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_2 #Player country quantity of eco_ghanaian_pound sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_2 #Player country quantity of eco_ghanaian_pound sell
					value  = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_ghanaian_pound_suply
				set_variable = {

					value  = {

							add = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_eco_ghanaian_pound_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_ghanaian_pound_order = 3
				var:eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_3 #Player country quantity of eco_ghanaian_pound sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_3 #Player country quantity of eco_ghanaian_pound sell
					value  = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_ghanaian_pound_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_eco_ghanaian_pound_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_ghanaian_pound_order = 4
				var:eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_4 #Player country quantity of eco_ghanaian_pound sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_4 #Player country quantity of eco_ghanaian_pound sell
					value  = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_ghanaian_pound_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_eco_ghanaian_pound_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_ghanaian_pound_order = 5
				var:eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_5 #Player country quantity of eco_ghanaian_pound sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_5 #Player country quantity of eco_ghanaian_pound sell
					value  = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_ghanaian_pound_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_eco_ghanaian_pound_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_ghanaian_pound_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = eco_ghanaian_pound_order
				#Player country quantity of eco_ghanaian_pound sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_eco_ghanaian_pound_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity < stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_eco_ghanaian_pound_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_eco_ghanaian_pound > 0

	}
}
sell_eco_ghanaian_pound_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity < player.stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_eco_ghanaian_pound_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_eco_ghanaian_pound > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_eco_ghanaian_pound
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_eco_ghanaian_pound
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
eco_ghanaian_pound_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_eco_ghanaian_pound
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
						add = owner.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_eco_ghanaian_pound

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#eco_nigerian_naira
eco_nigerian_naira_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
				#var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state
				#var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
eco_nigerian_naira_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
				var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_eco_nigerian_naira_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state > player.var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity

		money_supply_verification_eco_nigerian_naira < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_eco_nigerian_naira_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_eco_nigerian_naira_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state > player.var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_eco_nigerian_naira_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_eco_nigerian_naira_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_eco_nigerian_naira_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_eco_nigerian_naira_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:eco_nigerian_naira_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = eco_nigerian_naira_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_nigerian_naira_order = 1
				var:eco_nigerian_naira_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_sell_1 #Player country quantity of eco_nigerian_naira buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_buy_1 #Player country quantity of eco_nigerian_naira buy
					value  = var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:eco_nigerian_naira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_nigerian_naira_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_nigerian_naira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_eco_nigerian_naira_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_nigerian_naira_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_nigerian_naira_order = 2
				var:eco_nigerian_naira_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_sell_2 #Player country quantity of eco_nigerian_naira buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_buy_2 #Player country quantity of eco_nigerian_naira buy
					value  = var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:eco_nigerian_naira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_nigerian_naira_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_nigerian_naira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_eco_nigerian_naira_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_nigerian_naira_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_nigerian_naira_order = 3
				var:eco_nigerian_naira_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_sell_3 #Player country quantity of eco_nigerian_naira buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_buy_3 #Player country quantity of eco_nigerian_naira buy
					value  = var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:eco_nigerian_naira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_nigerian_naira_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_nigerian_naira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_eco_nigerian_naira_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_nigerian_naira_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_nigerian_naira_order = 4
				var:eco_nigerian_naira_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_sell_4 #Player country quantity of eco_nigerian_naira buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_buy_4 #Player country quantity of eco_nigerian_naira buy
					value  = var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:eco_nigerian_naira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_nigerian_naira_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_nigerian_naira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_eco_nigerian_naira_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_nigerian_naira_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_nigerian_naira_order = 5
				var:eco_nigerian_naira_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_sell_5 #Player country quantity of eco_nigerian_naira buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_buy_5 #Player country quantity of eco_nigerian_naira buy
					value  = var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:eco_nigerian_naira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_nigerian_naira_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_nigerian_naira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_eco_nigerian_naira_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_nigerian_naira_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_nigerian_naira_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = eco_nigerian_naira_order
				#Player country quantity of eco_nigerian_naira buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_eco_nigerian_naira_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:eco_nigerian_naira_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = eco_nigerian_naira_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_nigerian_naira_order = 1
				var:eco_nigerian_naira_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_sell_1 #Player country quantity of eco_nigerian_naira sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_sell_1 #Player country quantity of eco_nigerian_naira sell
					value  = var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:eco_nigerian_naira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to eco_nigerian_naira_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
							multiply = var:eco_nigerian_naira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_eco_nigerian_naira_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_eco_nigerian_naira_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:eco_nigerian_naira_order = 2
				var:eco_nigerian_naira_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_sell_2 #Player country quantity of eco_nigerian_naira sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
