							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_buy_5 #Player country quantity of gulden_bavarian_gulden buy
					value  = var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_bavarian_gulden_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_gulden_bavarian_gulden_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_bavarian_gulden_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_order
				#Player country quantity of gulden_bavarian_gulden buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_gulden_bavarian_gulden_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_order = 1
				var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_sell_1 #Player country quantity of gulden_bavarian_gulden sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_sell_1 #Player country quantity of gulden_bavarian_gulden sell
					value  = var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_bavarian_gulden_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_gulden_bavarian_gulden_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_bavarian_gulden_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_order = 2
				var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_sell_2 #Player country quantity of gulden_bavarian_gulden sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_sell_2 #Player country quantity of gulden_bavarian_gulden sell
					value  = var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_bavarian_gulden_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_gulden_bavarian_gulden_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_bavarian_gulden_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_order = 3
				var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_sell_3 #Player country quantity of gulden_bavarian_gulden sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_sell_3 #Player country quantity of gulden_bavarian_gulden sell
					value  = var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_bavarian_gulden_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_gulden_bavarian_gulden_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_bavarian_gulden_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_order = 4
				var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_sell_4 #Player country quantity of gulden_bavarian_gulden sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_sell_4 #Player country quantity of gulden_bavarian_gulden sell
					value  = var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_bavarian_gulden_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_gulden_bavarian_gulden_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_bavarian_gulden_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_order = 5
				var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_sell_5 #Player country quantity of gulden_bavarian_gulden sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_sell_5 #Player country quantity of gulden_bavarian_gulden sell
					value  = var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_bavarian_gulden_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_gulden_bavarian_gulden_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_bavarian_gulden_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_order
				#Player country quantity of gulden_bavarian_gulden sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_gulden_bavarian_gulden_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity < stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_gulden_bavarian_gulden_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_gulden_bavarian_gulden > 0

	}
}
sell_gulden_bavarian_gulden_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity < player.stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_gulden_bavarian_gulden_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_gulden_bavarian_gulden > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
gulden_bavarian_gulden_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_gulden_bavarian_gulden
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_gulden_bavarian_gulden
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
gulden_bavarian_gulden_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_gulden_bavarian_gulden
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
						add = owner.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_gulden_bavarian_gulden

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#gulden_florin
gulden_florin_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = gulden_florin_quantity
				#var:gulden_florin_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_gulden_florin_state
				#var:gulden_florin_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:gulden_florin_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = gulden_florin_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
gulden_florin_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = gulden_florin_quantity
				var:gulden_florin_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = gulden_florin_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_gulden_florin_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_gulden_florin_state > player.var:gulden_florin_quantity

		money_supply_verification_gulden_florin < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:gulden_florin_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_gulden_florin_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_gulden_florin_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_gulden_florin_state > player.var:gulden_florin_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_gulden_florin_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_gulden_florin_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_gulden_florin_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_gulden_florin_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:gulden_florin_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = gulden_florin_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_florin_order = 1
				var:gulden_florin_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_sell_1 #Player country quantity of gulden_florin buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_florin_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_florin_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_buy_1 #Player country quantity of gulden_florin buy
					value  = var:gulden_florin_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_florin_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_florin_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_gulden_florin_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_florin_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_florin_order = 2
				var:gulden_florin_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_sell_2 #Player country quantity of gulden_florin buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_florin_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_florin_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_buy_2 #Player country quantity of gulden_florin buy
					value  = var:gulden_florin_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_florin_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_florin_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_gulden_florin_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_florin_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_florin_order = 3
				var:gulden_florin_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_sell_3 #Player country quantity of gulden_florin buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_florin_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_florin_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_buy_3 #Player country quantity of gulden_florin buy
					value  = var:gulden_florin_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_florin_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_florin_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_gulden_florin_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_florin_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_florin_order = 4
				var:gulden_florin_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_sell_4 #Player country quantity of gulden_florin buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_florin_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_florin_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_buy_4 #Player country quantity of gulden_florin buy
					value  = var:gulden_florin_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_florin_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_florin_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_gulden_florin_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_florin_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_florin_order = 5
				var:gulden_florin_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_sell_5 #Player country quantity of gulden_florin buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_florin_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_florin_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_buy_5 #Player country quantity of gulden_florin buy
					value  = var:gulden_florin_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_florin_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_florin_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_gulden_florin_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_florin_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_florin_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = gulden_florin_order
				#Player country quantity of gulden_florin buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_gulden_florin_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:gulden_florin_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = gulden_florin_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_florin_order = 1
				var:gulden_florin_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_sell_1 #Player country quantity of gulden_florin sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_florin_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_florin_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_sell_1 #Player country quantity of gulden_florin sell
					value  = var:gulden_florin_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_florin_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_florin_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_gulden_florin_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_florin_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_florin_order = 2
				var:gulden_florin_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_sell_2 #Player country quantity of gulden_florin sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_florin_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_florin_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_sell_2 #Player country quantity of gulden_florin sell
					value  = var:gulden_florin_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_florin_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_florin_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_gulden_florin_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_florin_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_florin_order = 3
				var:gulden_florin_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_sell_3 #Player country quantity of gulden_florin sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_florin_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_florin_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_sell_3 #Player country quantity of gulden_florin sell
					value  = var:gulden_florin_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_florin_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_florin_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_gulden_florin_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_florin_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_florin_order = 4
				var:gulden_florin_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_sell_4 #Player country quantity of gulden_florin sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_florin_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_florin_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_sell_4 #Player country quantity of gulden_florin sell
					value  = var:gulden_florin_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_florin_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_florin_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_gulden_florin_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_florin_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_florin_order = 5
				var:gulden_florin_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_sell_5 #Player country quantity of gulden_florin sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_florin_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_florin_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_sell_5 #Player country quantity of gulden_florin sell
					value  = var:gulden_florin_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_florin_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_florin_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_florin_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_gulden_florin_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_florin_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_florin_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = gulden_florin_order
				#Player country quantity of gulden_florin sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_gulden_florin_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:gulden_florin_quantity < stockpiling_gulden_florin_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_gulden_florin_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_gulden_florin > 0

	}
}
sell_gulden_florin_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:gulden_florin_quantity < player.stockpiling_gulden_florin_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_gulden_florin_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_gulden_florin > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
gulden_florin_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_florin_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:gulden_florin_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_gulden_florin
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:gulden_florin_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:gulden_florin_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_gulden_florin
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
gulden_florin_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:gulden_florin_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:gulden_florin_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_gulden_florin
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
						add = owner.var:gulden_florin_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:gulden_florin_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_gulden_florin

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#gulden_hungarian_forint
gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
				#var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state
				#var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
				var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_gulden_hungarian_forint_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state > player.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity

		money_supply_verification_gulden_hungarian_forint < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_gulden_hungarian_forint_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_gulden_hungarian_forint_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state > player.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_gulden_hungarian_forint_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_gulden_hungarian_forint_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_gulden_hungarian_forint_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_gulden_hungarian_forint_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:gulden_hungarian_forint_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = gulden_hungarian_forint_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_hungarian_forint_order = 1
				var:gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_1 #Player country quantity of gulden_hungarian_forint buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_buy_1 #Player country quantity of gulden_hungarian_forint buy
					value  = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_hungarian_forint_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_gulden_hungarian_forint_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_hungarian_forint_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_hungarian_forint_order = 2
				var:gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_2 #Player country quantity of gulden_hungarian_forint buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_buy_2 #Player country quantity of gulden_hungarian_forint buy
					value  = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_hungarian_forint_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_gulden_hungarian_forint_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_hungarian_forint_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_hungarian_forint_order = 3
				var:gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_3 #Player country quantity of gulden_hungarian_forint buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_buy_3 #Player country quantity of gulden_hungarian_forint buy
					value  = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_hungarian_forint_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_gulden_hungarian_forint_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_hungarian_forint_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_hungarian_forint_order = 4
				var:gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_4 #Player country quantity of gulden_hungarian_forint buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_buy_4 #Player country quantity of gulden_hungarian_forint buy
					value  = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_hungarian_forint_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_gulden_hungarian_forint_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_hungarian_forint_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_hungarian_forint_order = 5
				var:gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_5 #Player country quantity of gulden_hungarian_forint buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_buy_5 #Player country quantity of gulden_hungarian_forint buy
					value  = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_hungarian_forint_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_gulden_hungarian_forint_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_hungarian_forint_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_hungarian_forint_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = gulden_hungarian_forint_order
				#Player country quantity of gulden_hungarian_forint buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_gulden_hungarian_forint_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = gulden_hungarian_forint_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_hungarian_forint_order = 1
				var:gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_1 #Player country quantity of gulden_hungarian_forint sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_1 #Player country quantity of gulden_hungarian_forint sell
					value  = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_hungarian_forint_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_gulden_hungarian_forint_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_hungarian_forint_order = 2
				var:gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_2 #Player country quantity of gulden_hungarian_forint sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_2 #Player country quantity of gulden_hungarian_forint sell
					value  = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_hungarian_forint_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_gulden_hungarian_forint_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_hungarian_forint_order = 3
				var:gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_3 #Player country quantity of gulden_hungarian_forint sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_3 #Player country quantity of gulden_hungarian_forint sell
					value  = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_hungarian_forint_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_gulden_hungarian_forint_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_hungarian_forint_order = 4
				var:gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_4 #Player country quantity of gulden_hungarian_forint sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_4 #Player country quantity of gulden_hungarian_forint sell
					value  = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_hungarian_forint_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_gulden_hungarian_forint_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_hungarian_forint_order = 5
				var:gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_5 #Player country quantity of gulden_hungarian_forint sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_5 #Player country quantity of gulden_hungarian_forint sell
					value  = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_hungarian_forint_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_hungarian_forint_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_hungarian_forint_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_gulden_hungarian_forint_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_hungarian_forint_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = gulden_hungarian_forint_order
				#Player country quantity of gulden_hungarian_forint sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_gulden_hungarian_forint_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity < stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_gulden_hungarian_forint_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_gulden_hungarian_forint > 0

	}
}
sell_gulden_hungarian_forint_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity < player.stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_gulden_hungarian_forint_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_gulden_hungarian_forint > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_gulden_hungarian_forint
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_gulden_hungarian_forint
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
gulden_hungarian_forint_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_gulden_hungarian_forint
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1
						add = owner.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:gulden_hungarian_forint_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_gulden_hungarian_forint

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#gulden_indies_guilder
gulden_indies_guilder_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
				#var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state
				#var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
gulden_indies_guilder_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
				var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_gulden_indies_guilder_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state > player.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity

		money_supply_verification_gulden_indies_guilder < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_gulden_indies_guilder_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_gulden_indies_guilder_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state > player.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_gulden_indies_guilder_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_gulden_indies_guilder_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_gulden_indies_guilder_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_gulden_indies_guilder_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:gulden_indies_guilder_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = gulden_indies_guilder_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_indies_guilder_order = 1
				var:gulden_indies_guilder_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_sell_1 #Player country quantity of gulden_indies_guilder buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_buy_1 #Player country quantity of gulden_indies_guilder buy
					value  = var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_indies_guilder_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_gulden_indies_guilder_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_indies_guilder_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_indies_guilder_order = 2
				var:gulden_indies_guilder_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_sell_2 #Player country quantity of gulden_indies_guilder buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_buy_2 #Player country quantity of gulden_indies_guilder buy
					value  = var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_indies_guilder_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_gulden_indies_guilder_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_indies_guilder_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_indies_guilder_order = 3
				var:gulden_indies_guilder_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_sell_3 #Player country quantity of gulden_indies_guilder buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_buy_3 #Player country quantity of gulden_indies_guilder buy
					value  = var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_indies_guilder_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_gulden_indies_guilder_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_indies_guilder_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_indies_guilder_order = 4
				var:gulden_indies_guilder_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_sell_4 #Player country quantity of gulden_indies_guilder buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
