					name = gulden_indies_guilder_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_buy_4 #Player country quantity of gulden_indies_guilder buy
					value  = var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_indies_guilder_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_gulden_indies_guilder_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_indies_guilder_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_indies_guilder_order = 5
				var:gulden_indies_guilder_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_sell_5 #Player country quantity of gulden_indies_guilder buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_buy_5 #Player country quantity of gulden_indies_guilder buy
					value  = var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_indies_guilder_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_gulden_indies_guilder_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_indies_guilder_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_indies_guilder_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = gulden_indies_guilder_order
				#Player country quantity of gulden_indies_guilder buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_gulden_indies_guilder_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:gulden_indies_guilder_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = gulden_indies_guilder_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_indies_guilder_order = 1
				var:gulden_indies_guilder_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_sell_1 #Player country quantity of gulden_indies_guilder sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_sell_1 #Player country quantity of gulden_indies_guilder sell
					value  = var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_indies_guilder_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_gulden_indies_guilder_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_indies_guilder_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_indies_guilder_order = 2
				var:gulden_indies_guilder_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_sell_2 #Player country quantity of gulden_indies_guilder sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_sell_2 #Player country quantity of gulden_indies_guilder sell
					value  = var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_indies_guilder_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_gulden_indies_guilder_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_indies_guilder_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_indies_guilder_order = 3
				var:gulden_indies_guilder_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_sell_3 #Player country quantity of gulden_indies_guilder sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_sell_3 #Player country quantity of gulden_indies_guilder sell
					value  = var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_indies_guilder_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_gulden_indies_guilder_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_indies_guilder_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_indies_guilder_order = 4
				var:gulden_indies_guilder_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_sell_4 #Player country quantity of gulden_indies_guilder sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_sell_4 #Player country quantity of gulden_indies_guilder sell
					value  = var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_indies_guilder_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_gulden_indies_guilder_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_indies_guilder_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_indies_guilder_order = 5
				var:gulden_indies_guilder_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_sell_5 #Player country quantity of gulden_indies_guilder sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_sell_5 #Player country quantity of gulden_indies_guilder sell
					value  = var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_indies_guilder_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_indies_guilder_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_indies_guilder_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_gulden_indies_guilder_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_indies_guilder_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_indies_guilder_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = gulden_indies_guilder_order
				#Player country quantity of gulden_indies_guilder sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_gulden_indies_guilder_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity < stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_gulden_indies_guilder_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_gulden_indies_guilder > 0

	}
}
sell_gulden_indies_guilder_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity < player.stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_gulden_indies_guilder_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_gulden_indies_guilder > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_gulden_indies_guilder_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_indies_guilder_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
gulden_indies_guilder_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_gulden_indies_guilder
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_gulden_indies_guilder
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
gulden_indies_guilder_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_gulden_indies_guilder
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state_1
						add = owner.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:gulden_indies_guilder_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_gulden_indies_guilder

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#gulden_south_german_gulden
gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
				#var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state
				#var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
				var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_gulden_south_german_gulden_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state > player.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity

		money_supply_verification_gulden_south_german_gulden < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_gulden_south_german_gulden_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_gulden_south_german_gulden_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state > player.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_gulden_south_german_gulden_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_gulden_south_german_gulden_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_gulden_south_german_gulden_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_gulden_south_german_gulden_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:gulden_south_german_gulden_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = gulden_south_german_gulden_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_south_german_gulden_order = 1
				var:gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_1 #Player country quantity of gulden_south_german_gulden buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_buy_1 #Player country quantity of gulden_south_german_gulden buy
					value  = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_south_german_gulden_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_gulden_south_german_gulden_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_south_german_gulden_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_south_german_gulden_order = 2
				var:gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_2 #Player country quantity of gulden_south_german_gulden buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_buy_2 #Player country quantity of gulden_south_german_gulden buy
					value  = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_south_german_gulden_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_gulden_south_german_gulden_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_south_german_gulden_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_south_german_gulden_order = 3
				var:gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_3 #Player country quantity of gulden_south_german_gulden buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_buy_3 #Player country quantity of gulden_south_german_gulden buy
					value  = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_south_german_gulden_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_gulden_south_german_gulden_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_south_german_gulden_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_south_german_gulden_order = 4
				var:gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_4 #Player country quantity of gulden_south_german_gulden buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_buy_4 #Player country quantity of gulden_south_german_gulden buy
					value  = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_south_german_gulden_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_gulden_south_german_gulden_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_south_german_gulden_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_south_german_gulden_order = 5
				var:gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_5 #Player country quantity of gulden_south_german_gulden buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_buy_5 #Player country quantity of gulden_south_german_gulden buy
					value  = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_south_german_gulden_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_gulden_south_german_gulden_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_south_german_gulden_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_south_german_gulden_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = gulden_south_german_gulden_order
				#Player country quantity of gulden_south_german_gulden buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_gulden_south_german_gulden_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = gulden_south_german_gulden_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_south_german_gulden_order = 1
				var:gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_1 #Player country quantity of gulden_south_german_gulden sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_1 #Player country quantity of gulden_south_german_gulden sell
					value  = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_south_german_gulden_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_gulden_south_german_gulden_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_south_german_gulden_order = 2
				var:gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_2 #Player country quantity of gulden_south_german_gulden sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_2 #Player country quantity of gulden_south_german_gulden sell
					value  = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_south_german_gulden_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_gulden_south_german_gulden_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_south_german_gulden_order = 3
				var:gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_3 #Player country quantity of gulden_south_german_gulden sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_3 #Player country quantity of gulden_south_german_gulden sell
					value  = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_south_german_gulden_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_gulden_south_german_gulden_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_south_german_gulden_order = 4
				var:gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_4 #Player country quantity of gulden_south_german_gulden sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_4 #Player country quantity of gulden_south_german_gulden sell
					value  = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_south_german_gulden_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_gulden_south_german_gulden_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_south_german_gulden_order = 5
				var:gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_5 #Player country quantity of gulden_south_german_gulden sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_5 #Player country quantity of gulden_south_german_gulden sell
					value  = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to gulden_south_german_gulden_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_south_german_gulden_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
							multiply = var:gulden_south_german_gulden_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_gulden_south_german_gulden_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gulden_south_german_gulden_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = gulden_south_german_gulden_order
				#Player country quantity of gulden_south_german_gulden sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_gulden_south_german_gulden_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity < stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_gulden_south_german_gulden_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_gulden_south_german_gulden > 0

	}
}
sell_gulden_south_german_gulden_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity < player.stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_gulden_south_german_gulden_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_gulden_south_german_gulden > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_gulden_south_german_gulden
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_gulden_south_german_gulden
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
gulden_south_german_gulden_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_gulden_south_german_gulden
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1
						add = owner.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:gulden_south_german_gulden_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_gulden_south_german_gulden

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#krone_czech_koruna
krone_czech_koruna_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = krone_czech_koruna_quantity
				#var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state
				#var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = krone_czech_koruna_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
krone_czech_koruna_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = krone_czech_koruna_quantity
				var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = krone_czech_koruna_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_krone_czech_koruna_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state > player.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity

		money_supply_verification_krone_czech_koruna < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_krone_czech_koruna_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_krone_czech_koruna_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state > player.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_krone_czech_koruna_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_krone_czech_koruna_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_krone_czech_koruna_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_krone_czech_koruna_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:krone_czech_koruna_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = krone_czech_koruna_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_czech_koruna_order = 1
				var:krone_czech_koruna_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_sell_1 #Player country quantity of krone_czech_koruna buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_buy_1 #Player country quantity of krone_czech_koruna buy
					value  = var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_czech_koruna_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_krone_czech_koruna_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_czech_koruna_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_czech_koruna_order = 2
				var:krone_czech_koruna_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_sell_2 #Player country quantity of krone_czech_koruna buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_buy_2 #Player country quantity of krone_czech_koruna buy
					value  = var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_czech_koruna_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_krone_czech_koruna_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_czech_koruna_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_czech_koruna_order = 3
				var:krone_czech_koruna_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_sell_3 #Player country quantity of krone_czech_koruna buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_buy_3 #Player country quantity of krone_czech_koruna buy
					value  = var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_czech_koruna_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_krone_czech_koruna_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_czech_koruna_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_czech_koruna_order = 4
				var:krone_czech_koruna_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_sell_4 #Player country quantity of krone_czech_koruna buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_buy_4 #Player country quantity of krone_czech_koruna buy
					value  = var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_czech_koruna_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_krone_czech_koruna_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_czech_koruna_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_czech_koruna_order = 5
				var:krone_czech_koruna_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_sell_5 #Player country quantity of krone_czech_koruna buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_buy_5 #Player country quantity of krone_czech_koruna buy
					value  = var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_czech_koruna_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_krone_czech_koruna_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_czech_koruna_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_czech_koruna_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = krone_czech_koruna_order
				#Player country quantity of krone_czech_koruna buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_krone_czech_koruna_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:krone_czech_koruna_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = krone_czech_koruna_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_czech_koruna_order = 1
				var:krone_czech_koruna_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_sell_1 #Player country quantity of krone_czech_koruna sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_sell_1 #Player country quantity of krone_czech_koruna sell
					value  = var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_czech_koruna_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_krone_czech_koruna_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_czech_koruna_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_czech_koruna_order = 2
				var:krone_czech_koruna_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_sell_2 #Player country quantity of krone_czech_koruna sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_sell_2 #Player country quantity of krone_czech_koruna sell
					value  = var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_czech_koruna_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_krone_czech_koruna_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_czech_koruna_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_czech_koruna_order = 3
				var:krone_czech_koruna_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_sell_3 #Player country quantity of krone_czech_koruna sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_sell_3 #Player country quantity of krone_czech_koruna sell
					value  = var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_czech_koruna_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_krone_czech_koruna_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_czech_koruna_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_czech_koruna_order = 4
				var:krone_czech_koruna_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_sell_4 #Player country quantity of krone_czech_koruna sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_sell_4 #Player country quantity of krone_czech_koruna sell
					value  = var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_czech_koruna_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_krone_czech_koruna_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_czech_koruna_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_czech_koruna_order = 5
				var:krone_czech_koruna_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_sell_5 #Player country quantity of krone_czech_koruna sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_sell_5 #Player country quantity of krone_czech_koruna sell
					value  = var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_czech_koruna_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_czech_koruna_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_czech_koruna_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_krone_czech_koruna_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_czech_koruna_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_czech_koruna_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = krone_czech_koruna_order
				#Player country quantity of krone_czech_koruna sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_krone_czech_koruna_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity < stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_krone_czech_koruna_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_krone_czech_koruna > 0

	}
}
sell_krone_czech_koruna_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity < player.stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_krone_czech_koruna_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_krone_czech_koruna > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
krone_czech_koruna_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_krone_czech_koruna
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_krone_czech_koruna
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
krone_czech_koruna_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_krone_czech_koruna
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1
						add = owner.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:krone_czech_koruna_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_krone_czech_koruna

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#krone_danish_krone
krone_danish_krone_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = krone_danish_krone_quantity
				#var:krone_danish_krone_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state
				#var:krone_danish_krone_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:krone_danish_krone_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = krone_danish_krone_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
krone_danish_krone_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = krone_danish_krone_quantity
				var:krone_danish_krone_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = krone_danish_krone_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_krone_danish_krone_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state > player.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity

		money_supply_verification_krone_danish_krone < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_krone_danish_krone_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_krone_danish_krone_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state > player.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_krone_danish_krone_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_krone_danish_krone_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_krone_danish_krone_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_krone_danish_krone_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:krone_danish_krone_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = krone_danish_krone_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_danish_krone_order = 1
				var:krone_danish_krone_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_sell_1 #Player country quantity of krone_danish_krone buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_buy_1 #Player country quantity of krone_danish_krone buy
					value  = var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_danish_krone_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_krone_danish_krone_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_danish_krone_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_danish_krone_order = 2
				var:krone_danish_krone_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_sell_2 #Player country quantity of krone_danish_krone buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
