									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_buy_2 #Player country quantity of krone_danish_krone buy
					value  = var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_danish_krone_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_krone_danish_krone_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_danish_krone_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_danish_krone_order = 3
				var:krone_danish_krone_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_sell_3 #Player country quantity of krone_danish_krone buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_buy_3 #Player country quantity of krone_danish_krone buy
					value  = var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_danish_krone_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_krone_danish_krone_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_danish_krone_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_danish_krone_order = 4
				var:krone_danish_krone_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_sell_4 #Player country quantity of krone_danish_krone buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_buy_4 #Player country quantity of krone_danish_krone buy
					value  = var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_danish_krone_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_krone_danish_krone_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_danish_krone_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_danish_krone_order = 5
				var:krone_danish_krone_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_sell_5 #Player country quantity of krone_danish_krone buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_buy_5 #Player country quantity of krone_danish_krone buy
					value  = var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_danish_krone_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_krone_danish_krone_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_danish_krone_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_danish_krone_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = krone_danish_krone_order
				#Player country quantity of krone_danish_krone buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_krone_danish_krone_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:krone_danish_krone_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = krone_danish_krone_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_danish_krone_order = 1
				var:krone_danish_krone_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_sell_1 #Player country quantity of krone_danish_krone sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_sell_1 #Player country quantity of krone_danish_krone sell
					value  = var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_danish_krone_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_krone_danish_krone_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_danish_krone_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_danish_krone_order = 2
				var:krone_danish_krone_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_sell_2 #Player country quantity of krone_danish_krone sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_sell_2 #Player country quantity of krone_danish_krone sell
					value  = var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_danish_krone_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_krone_danish_krone_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_danish_krone_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_danish_krone_order = 3
				var:krone_danish_krone_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_sell_3 #Player country quantity of krone_danish_krone sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_sell_3 #Player country quantity of krone_danish_krone sell
					value  = var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_danish_krone_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_krone_danish_krone_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_danish_krone_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_danish_krone_order = 4
				var:krone_danish_krone_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_sell_4 #Player country quantity of krone_danish_krone sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_sell_4 #Player country quantity of krone_danish_krone sell
					value  = var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_danish_krone_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_krone_danish_krone_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_danish_krone_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_danish_krone_order = 5
				var:krone_danish_krone_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_sell_5 #Player country quantity of krone_danish_krone sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_sell_5 #Player country quantity of krone_danish_krone sell
					value  = var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_danish_krone_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_danish_krone_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_danish_krone_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_krone_danish_krone_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_danish_krone_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_danish_krone_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = krone_danish_krone_order
				#Player country quantity of krone_danish_krone sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_krone_danish_krone_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity < stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_krone_danish_krone_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_krone_danish_krone > 0

	}
}
sell_krone_danish_krone_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity < player.stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_krone_danish_krone_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_krone_danish_krone > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_krone_danish_krone_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_danish_krone_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
krone_danish_krone_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_krone_danish_krone
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_krone_danish_krone
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
krone_danish_krone_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_krone_danish_krone
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state_1
						add = owner.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:krone_danish_krone_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_krone_danish_krone

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#krone_estonian_kroon
krone_estonian_kroon_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
				#var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state
				#var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
krone_estonian_kroon_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
				var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_krone_estonian_kroon_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state > player.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity

		money_supply_verification_krone_estonian_kroon < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_krone_estonian_kroon_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_krone_estonian_kroon_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state > player.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_krone_estonian_kroon_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_krone_estonian_kroon_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_krone_estonian_kroon_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_krone_estonian_kroon_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:krone_estonian_kroon_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = krone_estonian_kroon_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_estonian_kroon_order = 1
				var:krone_estonian_kroon_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_sell_1 #Player country quantity of krone_estonian_kroon buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_buy_1 #Player country quantity of krone_estonian_kroon buy
					value  = var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_estonian_kroon_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_krone_estonian_kroon_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_estonian_kroon_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_estonian_kroon_order = 2
				var:krone_estonian_kroon_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_sell_2 #Player country quantity of krone_estonian_kroon buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_buy_2 #Player country quantity of krone_estonian_kroon buy
					value  = var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_estonian_kroon_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_krone_estonian_kroon_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_estonian_kroon_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_estonian_kroon_order = 3
				var:krone_estonian_kroon_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_sell_3 #Player country quantity of krone_estonian_kroon buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_buy_3 #Player country quantity of krone_estonian_kroon buy
					value  = var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_estonian_kroon_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_krone_estonian_kroon_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_estonian_kroon_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_estonian_kroon_order = 4
				var:krone_estonian_kroon_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_sell_4 #Player country quantity of krone_estonian_kroon buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_buy_4 #Player country quantity of krone_estonian_kroon buy
					value  = var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_estonian_kroon_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_krone_estonian_kroon_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_estonian_kroon_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_estonian_kroon_order = 5
				var:krone_estonian_kroon_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_sell_5 #Player country quantity of krone_estonian_kroon buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_buy_5 #Player country quantity of krone_estonian_kroon buy
					value  = var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_estonian_kroon_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_krone_estonian_kroon_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_estonian_kroon_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_estonian_kroon_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = krone_estonian_kroon_order
				#Player country quantity of krone_estonian_kroon buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_krone_estonian_kroon_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:krone_estonian_kroon_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = krone_estonian_kroon_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_estonian_kroon_order = 1
				var:krone_estonian_kroon_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_sell_1 #Player country quantity of krone_estonian_kroon sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_sell_1 #Player country quantity of krone_estonian_kroon sell
					value  = var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_estonian_kroon_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_krone_estonian_kroon_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_estonian_kroon_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_estonian_kroon_order = 2
				var:krone_estonian_kroon_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_sell_2 #Player country quantity of krone_estonian_kroon sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_sell_2 #Player country quantity of krone_estonian_kroon sell
					value  = var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_estonian_kroon_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_krone_estonian_kroon_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_estonian_kroon_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_estonian_kroon_order = 3
				var:krone_estonian_kroon_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_sell_3 #Player country quantity of krone_estonian_kroon sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_sell_3 #Player country quantity of krone_estonian_kroon sell
					value  = var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_estonian_kroon_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_krone_estonian_kroon_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_estonian_kroon_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_estonian_kroon_order = 4
				var:krone_estonian_kroon_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_sell_4 #Player country quantity of krone_estonian_kroon sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_sell_4 #Player country quantity of krone_estonian_kroon sell
					value  = var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_estonian_kroon_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_krone_estonian_kroon_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_estonian_kroon_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_estonian_kroon_order = 5
				var:krone_estonian_kroon_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_sell_5 #Player country quantity of krone_estonian_kroon sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_sell_5 #Player country quantity of krone_estonian_kroon sell
					value  = var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_estonian_kroon_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_estonian_kroon_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_estonian_kroon_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_krone_estonian_kroon_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_estonian_kroon_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_estonian_kroon_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = krone_estonian_kroon_order
				#Player country quantity of krone_estonian_kroon sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_krone_estonian_kroon_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity < stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_krone_estonian_kroon_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_krone_estonian_kroon > 0

	}
}
sell_krone_estonian_kroon_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity < player.stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_krone_estonian_kroon_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_krone_estonian_kroon > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_krone_estonian_kroon_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_estonian_kroon_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
krone_estonian_kroon_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_krone_estonian_kroon
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_krone_estonian_kroon
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
krone_estonian_kroon_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_krone_estonian_kroon
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state_1
						add = owner.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:krone_estonian_kroon_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_krone_estonian_kroon

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#krone_icelandic_krona
krone_icelandic_krona_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
				#var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state
				#var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
krone_icelandic_krona_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
				var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_krone_icelandic_krona_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state > player.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity

		money_supply_verification_krone_icelandic_krona < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_krone_icelandic_krona_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_krone_icelandic_krona_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state > player.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_krone_icelandic_krona_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_krone_icelandic_krona_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_krone_icelandic_krona_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_krone_icelandic_krona_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:krone_icelandic_krona_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = krone_icelandic_krona_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_icelandic_krona_order = 1
				var:krone_icelandic_krona_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_sell_1 #Player country quantity of krone_icelandic_krona buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_buy_1 #Player country quantity of krone_icelandic_krona buy
					value  = var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_icelandic_krona_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_krone_icelandic_krona_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_icelandic_krona_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_icelandic_krona_order = 2
				var:krone_icelandic_krona_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_sell_2 #Player country quantity of krone_icelandic_krona buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_buy_2 #Player country quantity of krone_icelandic_krona buy
					value  = var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_icelandic_krona_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_krone_icelandic_krona_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_icelandic_krona_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_icelandic_krona_order = 3
				var:krone_icelandic_krona_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_sell_3 #Player country quantity of krone_icelandic_krona buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_buy_3 #Player country quantity of krone_icelandic_krona buy
					value  = var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_icelandic_krona_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_krone_icelandic_krona_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_icelandic_krona_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_icelandic_krona_order = 4
				var:krone_icelandic_krona_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_sell_4 #Player country quantity of krone_icelandic_krona buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_buy_4 #Player country quantity of krone_icelandic_krona buy
					value  = var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_icelandic_krona_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_krone_icelandic_krona_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_icelandic_krona_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_icelandic_krona_order = 5
				var:krone_icelandic_krona_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_sell_5 #Player country quantity of krone_icelandic_krona buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_buy_5 #Player country quantity of krone_icelandic_krona buy
					value  = var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_icelandic_krona_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_krone_icelandic_krona_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_icelandic_krona_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_icelandic_krona_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = krone_icelandic_krona_order
				#Player country quantity of krone_icelandic_krona buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_krone_icelandic_krona_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:krone_icelandic_krona_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = krone_icelandic_krona_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_icelandic_krona_order = 1
				var:krone_icelandic_krona_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_sell_1 #Player country quantity of krone_icelandic_krona sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_sell_1 #Player country quantity of krone_icelandic_krona sell
					value  = var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_icelandic_krona_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_krone_icelandic_krona_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_icelandic_krona_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_icelandic_krona_order = 2
				var:krone_icelandic_krona_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_sell_2 #Player country quantity of krone_icelandic_krona sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_sell_2 #Player country quantity of krone_icelandic_krona sell
					value  = var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_icelandic_krona_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_krone_icelandic_krona_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_icelandic_krona_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_icelandic_krona_order = 3
				var:krone_icelandic_krona_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_sell_3 #Player country quantity of krone_icelandic_krona sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_sell_3 #Player country quantity of krone_icelandic_krona sell
					value  = var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_icelandic_krona_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_krone_icelandic_krona_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_icelandic_krona_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_icelandic_krona_order = 4
				var:krone_icelandic_krona_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_sell_4 #Player country quantity of krone_icelandic_krona sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_sell_4 #Player country quantity of krone_icelandic_krona sell
					value  = var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_icelandic_krona_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_krone_icelandic_krona_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_icelandic_krona_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_icelandic_krona_order = 5
				var:krone_icelandic_krona_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_sell_5 #Player country quantity of krone_icelandic_krona sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_sell_5 #Player country quantity of krone_icelandic_krona sell
					value  = var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to krone_icelandic_krona_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_icelandic_krona_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
							multiply = var:krone_icelandic_krona_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_krone_icelandic_krona_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_krone_icelandic_krona_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_icelandic_krona_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = krone_icelandic_krona_order
				#Player country quantity of krone_icelandic_krona sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_krone_icelandic_krona_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity < stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_krone_icelandic_krona_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_krone_icelandic_krona > 0

	}
}
sell_krone_icelandic_krona_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity < player.stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_krone_icelandic_krona_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_krone_icelandic_krona > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_krone_icelandic_krona_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_icelandic_krona_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
krone_icelandic_krona_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_krone_icelandic_krona
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_krone_icelandic_krona
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
krone_icelandic_krona_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_krone_icelandic_krona
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state_1
						add = owner.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:krone_icelandic_krona_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_krone_icelandic_krona

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#krone_norwegian_krone
krone_norwegian_krone_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = krone_norwegian_krone_quantity
				#var:krone_norwegian_krone_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state
				#var:krone_norwegian_krone_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:krone_norwegian_krone_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = krone_norwegian_krone_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
krone_norwegian_krone_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = krone_norwegian_krone_quantity
				var:krone_norwegian_krone_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = krone_norwegian_krone_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_krone_norwegian_krone_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state > player.var:krone_norwegian_krone_quantity

		money_supply_verification_krone_norwegian_krone < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:krone_norwegian_krone_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_krone_norwegian_krone_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_krone_norwegian_krone_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state > player.var:krone_norwegian_krone_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_krone_norwegian_krone_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_krone_norwegian_krone_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_krone_norwegian_krone_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_krone_norwegian_krone_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:krone_norwegian_krone_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = krone_norwegian_krone_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:krone_norwegian_krone_order = 1
				var:krone_norwegian_krone_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = krone_norwegian_krone_sell_1 #Player country quantity of krone_norwegian_krone buy
