}
leon_leu_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = leon_leu_quantity
				var:leon_leu_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = leon_leu_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_leon_leu_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_leon_leu_state > player.var:leon_leu_quantity

		money_supply_verification_leon_leu < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:leon_leu_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_leon_leu_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_leon_leu_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_leon_leu_state > player.var:leon_leu_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_leon_leu_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_leon_leu_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_leon_leu_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_leon_leu_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:leon_leu_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = leon_leu_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:leon_leu_order = 1
				var:leon_leu_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_sell_1 #Player country quantity of leon_leu buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:leon_leu_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:leon_leu_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_buy_1 #Player country quantity of leon_leu buy
					value  = var:leon_leu_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to leon_leu_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:leon_leu_quantity
							multiply = var:leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_leon_leu_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_leon_leu_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:leon_leu_order = 2
				var:leon_leu_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_sell_2 #Player country quantity of leon_leu buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:leon_leu_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:leon_leu_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_buy_2 #Player country quantity of leon_leu buy
					value  = var:leon_leu_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to leon_leu_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:leon_leu_quantity
							multiply = var:leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_leon_leu_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_leon_leu_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:leon_leu_order = 3
				var:leon_leu_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_sell_3 #Player country quantity of leon_leu buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:leon_leu_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:leon_leu_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_buy_3 #Player country quantity of leon_leu buy
					value  = var:leon_leu_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to leon_leu_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:leon_leu_quantity
							multiply = var:leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_leon_leu_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_leon_leu_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:leon_leu_order = 4
				var:leon_leu_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_sell_4 #Player country quantity of leon_leu buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:leon_leu_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:leon_leu_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_buy_4 #Player country quantity of leon_leu buy
					value  = var:leon_leu_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to leon_leu_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:leon_leu_quantity
							multiply = var:leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_leon_leu_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_leon_leu_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:leon_leu_order = 5
				var:leon_leu_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_sell_5 #Player country quantity of leon_leu buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:leon_leu_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:leon_leu_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_buy_5 #Player country quantity of leon_leu buy
					value  = var:leon_leu_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to leon_leu_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:leon_leu_quantity
							multiply = var:leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_leon_leu_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_leon_leu_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:leon_leu_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = leon_leu_order
				#Player country quantity of leon_leu buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_leon_leu_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:leon_leu_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = leon_leu_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:leon_leu_order = 1
				var:leon_leu_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_sell_1 #Player country quantity of leon_leu sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:leon_leu_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:leon_leu_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_sell_1 #Player country quantity of leon_leu sell
					value  = var:leon_leu_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to leon_leu_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:leon_leu_quantity
							multiply = var:leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_leon_leu_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_leon_leu_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:leon_leu_order = 2
				var:leon_leu_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_sell_2 #Player country quantity of leon_leu sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:leon_leu_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:leon_leu_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_sell_2 #Player country quantity of leon_leu sell
					value  = var:leon_leu_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to leon_leu_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:leon_leu_quantity
							multiply = var:leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_leon_leu_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_leon_leu_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:leon_leu_order = 3
				var:leon_leu_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_sell_3 #Player country quantity of leon_leu sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:leon_leu_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:leon_leu_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_sell_3 #Player country quantity of leon_leu sell
					value  = var:leon_leu_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to leon_leu_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:leon_leu_quantity
							multiply = var:leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_leon_leu_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_leon_leu_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:leon_leu_order = 4
				var:leon_leu_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_sell_4 #Player country quantity of leon_leu sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:leon_leu_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:leon_leu_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_sell_4 #Player country quantity of leon_leu sell
					value  = var:leon_leu_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to leon_leu_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:leon_leu_quantity
							multiply = var:leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_leon_leu_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_leon_leu_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:leon_leu_order = 5
				var:leon_leu_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_sell_5 #Player country quantity of leon_leu sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:leon_leu_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:leon_leu_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_sell_5 #Player country quantity of leon_leu sell
					value  = var:leon_leu_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to leon_leu_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_leu_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:leon_leu_quantity
							multiply = var:leon_leu_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_leon_leu_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_leon_leu_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:leon_leu_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = leon_leu_order
				#Player country quantity of leon_leu sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_leon_leu_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:leon_leu_quantity < stockpiling_leon_leu_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_leon_leu_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_leon_leu > 0

	}
}
sell_leon_leu_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:leon_leu_quantity < player.stockpiling_leon_leu_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_leon_leu_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_leon_leu > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_leon_leu_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_leon_leu_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
leon_leu_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_leon_leu_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:leon_leu_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:leon_leu_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_leon_leu
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leon_leu_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:leon_leu_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:leon_leu_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_leon_leu
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
leon_leu_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_leon_leu_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:leon_leu_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:leon_leu_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_leon_leu
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leon_leu_state_1
						add = owner.var:leon_leu_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:leon_leu_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_leon_leu

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#leon_lev
leon_lev_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = leon_lev_quantity
				#var:leon_lev_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_leon_lev_state
				#var:leon_lev_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:leon_lev_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = leon_lev_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
leon_lev_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = leon_lev_quantity
				var:leon_lev_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = leon_lev_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_leon_lev_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_leon_lev_state > player.var:leon_lev_quantity

		money_supply_verification_leon_lev < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:leon_lev_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_leon_lev_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_leon_lev_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_leon_lev_state > player.var:leon_lev_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_leon_lev_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_leon_lev_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_leon_lev_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_leon_lev_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:leon_lev_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = leon_lev_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:leon_lev_order = 1
				var:leon_lev_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_sell_1 #Player country quantity of leon_lev buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:leon_lev_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:leon_lev_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_buy_1 #Player country quantity of leon_lev buy
					value  = var:leon_lev_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to leon_lev_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:leon_lev_quantity
							multiply = var:leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_leon_lev_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_leon_lev_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:leon_lev_order = 2
				var:leon_lev_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_sell_2 #Player country quantity of leon_lev buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:leon_lev_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:leon_lev_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_buy_2 #Player country quantity of leon_lev buy
					value  = var:leon_lev_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to leon_lev_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:leon_lev_quantity
							multiply = var:leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_leon_lev_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_leon_lev_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:leon_lev_order = 3
				var:leon_lev_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_sell_3 #Player country quantity of leon_lev buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:leon_lev_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:leon_lev_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_buy_3 #Player country quantity of leon_lev buy
					value  = var:leon_lev_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to leon_lev_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:leon_lev_quantity
							multiply = var:leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_leon_lev_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_leon_lev_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:leon_lev_order = 4
				var:leon_lev_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_sell_4 #Player country quantity of leon_lev buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:leon_lev_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:leon_lev_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_buy_4 #Player country quantity of leon_lev buy
					value  = var:leon_lev_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to leon_lev_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:leon_lev_quantity
							multiply = var:leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_leon_lev_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_leon_lev_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:leon_lev_order = 5
				var:leon_lev_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_sell_5 #Player country quantity of leon_lev buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:leon_lev_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:leon_lev_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_buy_5 #Player country quantity of leon_lev buy
					value  = var:leon_lev_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to leon_lev_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:leon_lev_quantity
							multiply = var:leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_leon_lev_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_leon_lev_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:leon_lev_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = leon_lev_order
				#Player country quantity of leon_lev buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_leon_lev_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:leon_lev_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = leon_lev_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:leon_lev_order = 1
				var:leon_lev_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_sell_1 #Player country quantity of leon_lev sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:leon_lev_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:leon_lev_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_sell_1 #Player country quantity of leon_lev sell
					value  = var:leon_lev_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to leon_lev_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:leon_lev_quantity
							multiply = var:leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_leon_lev_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_leon_lev_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:leon_lev_order = 2
				var:leon_lev_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_sell_2 #Player country quantity of leon_lev sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:leon_lev_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:leon_lev_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_sell_2 #Player country quantity of leon_lev sell
					value  = var:leon_lev_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to leon_lev_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:leon_lev_quantity
							multiply = var:leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_leon_lev_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_leon_lev_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:leon_lev_order = 3
				var:leon_lev_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_sell_3 #Player country quantity of leon_lev sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:leon_lev_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:leon_lev_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_sell_3 #Player country quantity of leon_lev sell
					value  = var:leon_lev_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to leon_lev_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:leon_lev_quantity
							multiply = var:leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_leon_lev_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_leon_lev_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:leon_lev_order = 4
				var:leon_lev_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_sell_4 #Player country quantity of leon_lev sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:leon_lev_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:leon_lev_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_sell_4 #Player country quantity of leon_lev sell
					value  = var:leon_lev_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to leon_lev_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:leon_lev_quantity
							multiply = var:leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_leon_lev_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_leon_lev_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:leon_lev_order = 5
				var:leon_lev_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_sell_5 #Player country quantity of leon_lev sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:leon_lev_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:leon_lev_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_sell_5 #Player country quantity of leon_lev sell
					value  = var:leon_lev_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to leon_lev_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = leon_lev_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:leon_lev_quantity
							multiply = var:leon_lev_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_leon_lev_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_leon_lev_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:leon_lev_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = leon_lev_order
				#Player country quantity of leon_lev sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_leon_lev_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:leon_lev_quantity < stockpiling_leon_lev_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_leon_lev_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_leon_lev > 0

	}
}
sell_leon_lev_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:leon_lev_quantity < player.stockpiling_leon_lev_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_leon_lev_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_leon_lev > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_leon_lev_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_leon_lev_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
leon_lev_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_leon_lev_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:leon_lev_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:leon_lev_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_leon_lev
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leon_lev_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:leon_lev_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:leon_lev_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_leon_lev
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
leon_lev_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_leon_lev_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:leon_lev_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:leon_lev_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_leon_lev
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leon_lev_state_1
						add = owner.var:leon_lev_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:leon_lev_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_leon_lev

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#lira
lira_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = lira_quantity
				#var:lira_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_lira_state
				#var:lira_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:lira_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = lira_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
lira_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = lira_quantity
				var:lira_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = lira_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_lira_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_lira_state > player.var:lira_quantity

		money_supply_verification_lira < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:lira_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_lira_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_lira_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_lira_state > player.var:lira_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_lira_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_lira_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_lira_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_lira_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:lira_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = lira_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:lira_order = 1
				var:lira_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_sell_1 #Player country quantity of lira buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = lira_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_buy_1 #Player country quantity of lira buy
					value  = var:lira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to lira_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:lira_quantity
							multiply = var:lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_lira_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_lira_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:lira_order = 2
				var:lira_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_sell_2 #Player country quantity of lira buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = lira_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_buy_2 #Player country quantity of lira buy
					value  = var:lira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to lira_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:lira_quantity
							multiply = var:lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_lira_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_lira_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:lira_order = 3
				var:lira_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_sell_3 #Player country quantity of lira buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = lira_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_buy_3 #Player country quantity of lira buy
					value  = var:lira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to lira_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:lira_quantity
							multiply = var:lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_lira_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_lira_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:lira_order = 4
				var:lira_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_sell_4 #Player country quantity of lira buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = lira_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_buy_4 #Player country quantity of lira buy
					value  = var:lira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to lira_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:lira_quantity
							multiply = var:lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_lira_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_lira_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:lira_order = 5
				var:lira_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_sell_5 #Player country quantity of lira buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = lira_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_buy_5 #Player country quantity of lira buy
					value  = var:lira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to lira_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:lira_quantity
							multiply = var:lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_lira_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_lira_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:lira_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = lira_order
				#Player country quantity of lira buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_lira_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:lira_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = lira_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:lira_order = 1
				var:lira_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_sell_1 #Player country quantity of lira sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = lira_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_sell_1 #Player country quantity of lira sell
					value  = var:lira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to lira_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:lira_quantity
							multiply = var:lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_lira_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_lira_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:lira_order = 2
				var:lira_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_sell_2 #Player country quantity of lira sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = lira_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_sell_2 #Player country quantity of lira sell
					value  = var:lira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to lira_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:lira_quantity
							multiply = var:lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_lira_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_lira_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:lira_order = 3
				var:lira_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_sell_3 #Player country quantity of lira sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = lira_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_sell_3 #Player country quantity of lira sell
					value  = var:lira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to lira_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:lira_quantity
							multiply = var:lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_lira_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_lira_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:lira_order = 4
				var:lira_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_sell_4 #Player country quantity of lira sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = lira_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_sell_4 #Player country quantity of lira sell
					value  = var:lira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to lira_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:lira_quantity
							multiply = var:lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_lira_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_lira_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:lira_order = 5
				var:lira_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_sell_5 #Player country quantity of lira sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = lira_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_sell_5 #Player country quantity of lira sell
					value  = var:lira_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to lira_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:lira_quantity
							multiply = var:lira_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_lira_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_lira_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:lira_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = lira_order
				#Player country quantity of lira sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_lira_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:lira_quantity < stockpiling_lira_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_lira_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_lira > 0

	}
}
sell_lira_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:lira_quantity < player.stockpiling_lira_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_lira_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_lira > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
lira_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_lira
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:lira_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_lira
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
lira_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_lira
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
						add = owner.var:lira_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_lira

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#lira_ducato
lira_ducato_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = lira_ducato_quantity
				#var:lira_ducato_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_lira_ducato_state
				#var:lira_ducato_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:lira_ducato_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = lira_ducato_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
lira_ducato_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = lira_ducato_quantity
				var:lira_ducato_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = lira_ducato_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_lira_ducato_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_lira_ducato_state > player.var:lira_ducato_quantity

		money_supply_verification_lira_ducato < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:lira_ducato_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_lira_ducato_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_lira_ducato_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_lira_ducato_state > player.var:lira_ducato_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_lira_ducato_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_lira_ducato_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_lira_ducato_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_lira_ducato_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:lira_ducato_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = lira_ducato_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:lira_ducato_order = 1
				var:lira_ducato_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_ducato_sell_1 #Player country quantity of lira_ducato buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:lira_ducato_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_ducato_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = lira_ducato_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lira_ducato_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_ducato_buy_1 #Player country quantity of lira_ducato buy
					value  = var:lira_ducato_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_ducato_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:lira_ducato_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to lira_ducato_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_ducato_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:lira_ducato_quantity
							multiply = var:lira_ducato_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_lira_ducato_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_lira_ducato_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:lira_ducato_order = 2
				var:lira_ducato_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_ducato_sell_2 #Player country quantity of lira_ducato buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:lira_ducato_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_ducato_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = lira_ducato_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lira_ducato_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_ducato_buy_2 #Player country quantity of lira_ducato buy
					value  = var:lira_ducato_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_ducato_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:lira_ducato_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to lira_ducato_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_ducato_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:lira_ducato_quantity
							multiply = var:lira_ducato_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_lira_ducato_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_lira_ducato_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:lira_ducato_order = 3
				var:lira_ducato_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_ducato_sell_3 #Player country quantity of lira_ducato buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:lira_ducato_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_ducato_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = lira_ducato_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lira_ducato_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_ducato_buy_3 #Player country quantity of lira_ducato buy
					value  = var:lira_ducato_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_ducato_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:lira_ducato_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to lira_ducato_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_ducato_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:lira_ducato_quantity
							multiply = var:lira_ducato_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
