						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_buy_2 #Player country quantity of peso_mexican_peso buy
					value  = var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_mexican_peso_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_peso_mexican_peso_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_mexican_peso_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_mexican_peso_order = 3
				var:peso_mexican_peso_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_sell_3 #Player country quantity of peso_mexican_peso buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_buy_3 #Player country quantity of peso_mexican_peso buy
					value  = var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_mexican_peso_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_peso_mexican_peso_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_mexican_peso_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_mexican_peso_order = 4
				var:peso_mexican_peso_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_sell_4 #Player country quantity of peso_mexican_peso buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_buy_4 #Player country quantity of peso_mexican_peso buy
					value  = var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_mexican_peso_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_peso_mexican_peso_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_mexican_peso_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_mexican_peso_order = 5
				var:peso_mexican_peso_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_sell_5 #Player country quantity of peso_mexican_peso buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_buy_5 #Player country quantity of peso_mexican_peso buy
					value  = var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_mexican_peso_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_peso_mexican_peso_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_mexican_peso_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_mexican_peso_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = peso_mexican_peso_order
				#Player country quantity of peso_mexican_peso buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_mexican_peso_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:peso_mexican_peso_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = peso_mexican_peso_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_mexican_peso_order = 1
				var:peso_mexican_peso_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_sell_1 #Player country quantity of peso_mexican_peso sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_sell_1 #Player country quantity of peso_mexican_peso sell
					value  = var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_mexican_peso_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_peso_mexican_peso_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_mexican_peso_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_mexican_peso_order = 2
				var:peso_mexican_peso_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_sell_2 #Player country quantity of peso_mexican_peso sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_sell_2 #Player country quantity of peso_mexican_peso sell
					value  = var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_mexican_peso_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_peso_mexican_peso_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_mexican_peso_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_mexican_peso_order = 3
				var:peso_mexican_peso_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_sell_3 #Player country quantity of peso_mexican_peso sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_sell_3 #Player country quantity of peso_mexican_peso sell
					value  = var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_mexican_peso_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_peso_mexican_peso_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_mexican_peso_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_mexican_peso_order = 4
				var:peso_mexican_peso_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_sell_4 #Player country quantity of peso_mexican_peso sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_sell_4 #Player country quantity of peso_mexican_peso sell
					value  = var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_mexican_peso_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_peso_mexican_peso_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_mexican_peso_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_mexican_peso_order = 5
				var:peso_mexican_peso_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_sell_5 #Player country quantity of peso_mexican_peso sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_sell_5 #Player country quantity of peso_mexican_peso sell
					value  = var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_mexican_peso_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_mexican_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_mexican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_peso_mexican_peso_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_mexican_peso_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_mexican_peso_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = peso_mexican_peso_order
				#Player country quantity of peso_mexican_peso sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_peso_mexican_peso_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity < stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_peso_mexican_peso_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_peso_mexican_peso > 0

	}
}
sell_peso_mexican_peso_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity < player.stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_peso_mexican_peso_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_peso_mexican_peso > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_peso_mexican_peso_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_mexican_peso_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_mexican_peso_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_peso_mexican_peso
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_peso_mexican_peso
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_mexican_peso_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_peso_mexican_peso
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:peso_mexican_peso_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_peso_mexican_peso

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#peso_nicaraguan_cordoba
peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
				#var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state
				#var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
				var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state > player.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity

		money_supply_verification_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state > player.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_order = 1
				var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_1 #Player country quantity of peso_nicaraguan_cordoba buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_buy_1 #Player country quantity of peso_nicaraguan_cordoba buy
					value  = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_order = 2
				var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_2 #Player country quantity of peso_nicaraguan_cordoba buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_buy_2 #Player country quantity of peso_nicaraguan_cordoba buy
					value  = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_order = 3
				var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_3 #Player country quantity of peso_nicaraguan_cordoba buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_buy_3 #Player country quantity of peso_nicaraguan_cordoba buy
					value  = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_order = 4
				var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_4 #Player country quantity of peso_nicaraguan_cordoba buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_buy_4 #Player country quantity of peso_nicaraguan_cordoba buy
					value  = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_order = 5
				var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_5 #Player country quantity of peso_nicaraguan_cordoba buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_buy_5 #Player country quantity of peso_nicaraguan_cordoba buy
					value  = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_order
				#Player country quantity of peso_nicaraguan_cordoba buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_order = 1
				var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_1 #Player country quantity of peso_nicaraguan_cordoba sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_1 #Player country quantity of peso_nicaraguan_cordoba sell
					value  = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_order = 2
				var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_2 #Player country quantity of peso_nicaraguan_cordoba sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_2 #Player country quantity of peso_nicaraguan_cordoba sell
					value  = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_order = 3
				var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_3 #Player country quantity of peso_nicaraguan_cordoba sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_3 #Player country quantity of peso_nicaraguan_cordoba sell
					value  = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_order = 4
				var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_4 #Player country quantity of peso_nicaraguan_cordoba sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_4 #Player country quantity of peso_nicaraguan_cordoba sell
					value  = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_order = 5
				var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_5 #Player country quantity of peso_nicaraguan_cordoba sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_5 #Player country quantity of peso_nicaraguan_cordoba sell
					value  = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_order
				#Player country quantity of peso_nicaraguan_cordoba sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity < stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba > 0

	}
}
sell_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity < player.stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
						add = owner.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#peso_paraguayan_peso
peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
				#var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state
				#var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
				var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_peso_paraguayan_peso_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state > player.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity

		money_supply_verification_peso_paraguayan_peso < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_peso_paraguayan_peso_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_paraguayan_peso_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state > player.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_peso_paraguayan_peso_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_peso_paraguayan_peso_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_peso_paraguayan_peso_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_peso_paraguayan_peso_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:peso_paraguayan_peso_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = peso_paraguayan_peso_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_paraguayan_peso_order = 1
				var:peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_1 #Player country quantity of peso_paraguayan_peso buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_buy_1 #Player country quantity of peso_paraguayan_peso buy
					value  = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_paraguayan_peso_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_peso_paraguayan_peso_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_paraguayan_peso_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_paraguayan_peso_order = 2
				var:peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_2 #Player country quantity of peso_paraguayan_peso buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_buy_2 #Player country quantity of peso_paraguayan_peso buy
					value  = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_paraguayan_peso_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_peso_paraguayan_peso_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_paraguayan_peso_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_paraguayan_peso_order = 3
				var:peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_3 #Player country quantity of peso_paraguayan_peso buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_buy_3 #Player country quantity of peso_paraguayan_peso buy
					value  = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_paraguayan_peso_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_peso_paraguayan_peso_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_paraguayan_peso_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_paraguayan_peso_order = 4
				var:peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_4 #Player country quantity of peso_paraguayan_peso buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_buy_4 #Player country quantity of peso_paraguayan_peso buy
					value  = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_paraguayan_peso_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_peso_paraguayan_peso_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_paraguayan_peso_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_paraguayan_peso_order = 5
				var:peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_5 #Player country quantity of peso_paraguayan_peso buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_buy_5 #Player country quantity of peso_paraguayan_peso buy
					value  = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_paraguayan_peso_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_peso_paraguayan_peso_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_paraguayan_peso_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_paraguayan_peso_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = peso_paraguayan_peso_order
				#Player country quantity of peso_paraguayan_peso buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_paraguayan_peso_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = peso_paraguayan_peso_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_paraguayan_peso_order = 1
				var:peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_1 #Player country quantity of peso_paraguayan_peso sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_1 #Player country quantity of peso_paraguayan_peso sell
					value  = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_paraguayan_peso_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_peso_paraguayan_peso_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_paraguayan_peso_order = 2
				var:peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_2 #Player country quantity of peso_paraguayan_peso sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_2 #Player country quantity of peso_paraguayan_peso sell
					value  = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_paraguayan_peso_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_peso_paraguayan_peso_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_paraguayan_peso_order = 3
				var:peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_3 #Player country quantity of peso_paraguayan_peso sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_3 #Player country quantity of peso_paraguayan_peso sell
					value  = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_paraguayan_peso_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_peso_paraguayan_peso_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_paraguayan_peso_order = 4
				var:peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_4 #Player country quantity of peso_paraguayan_peso sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_4 #Player country quantity of peso_paraguayan_peso sell
					value  = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_paraguayan_peso_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_peso_paraguayan_peso_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_paraguayan_peso_order = 5
				var:peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_5 #Player country quantity of peso_paraguayan_peso sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_5 #Player country quantity of peso_paraguayan_peso sell
					value  = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to peso_paraguayan_peso_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_paraguayan_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:peso_paraguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_peso_paraguayan_peso_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:peso_paraguayan_peso_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = peso_paraguayan_peso_order
				#Player country quantity of peso_paraguayan_peso sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_peso_paraguayan_peso_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity < stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_peso_paraguayan_peso_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_peso_paraguayan_peso > 0

	}
}
sell_peso_paraguayan_peso_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity < player.stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_peso_paraguayan_peso_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_peso_paraguayan_peso > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_peso_paraguayan_peso_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_paraguayan_peso_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_peso_paraguayan_peso
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_peso_paraguayan_peso
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_paraguayan_peso_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_peso_paraguayan_peso
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:peso_paraguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_peso_paraguayan_peso

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#peso_philippine_peso
peso_philippine_peso_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = peso_philippine_peso_quantity
				#var:peso_philippine_peso_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state
				#var:peso_philippine_peso_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:peso_philippine_peso_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = peso_philippine_peso_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_philippine_peso_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = peso_philippine_peso_quantity
				var:peso_philippine_peso_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = peso_philippine_peso_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_peso_philippine_peso_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state > player.var:peso_philippine_peso_quantity

		money_supply_verification_peso_philippine_peso < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:peso_philippine_peso_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_peso_philippine_peso_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_philippine_peso_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state > player.var:peso_philippine_peso_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_peso_philippine_peso_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_peso_philippine_peso_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_peso_philippine_peso_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_peso_philippine_peso_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:peso_philippine_peso_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
