					name = rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_buy_1 #Player country quantity of rupee_indian_rupee buy
					value  = var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to rupee_indian_rupee_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
							multiply = var:rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_rupee_indian_rupee_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_rupee_indian_rupee_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:rupee_indian_rupee_order = 2
				var:rupee_indian_rupee_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_sell_2 #Player country quantity of rupee_indian_rupee buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_buy_2 #Player country quantity of rupee_indian_rupee buy
					value  = var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to rupee_indian_rupee_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
							multiply = var:rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_rupee_indian_rupee_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_rupee_indian_rupee_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:rupee_indian_rupee_order = 3
				var:rupee_indian_rupee_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_sell_3 #Player country quantity of rupee_indian_rupee buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_buy_3 #Player country quantity of rupee_indian_rupee buy
					value  = var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to rupee_indian_rupee_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
							multiply = var:rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_rupee_indian_rupee_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_rupee_indian_rupee_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:rupee_indian_rupee_order = 4
				var:rupee_indian_rupee_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_sell_4 #Player country quantity of rupee_indian_rupee buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_buy_4 #Player country quantity of rupee_indian_rupee buy
					value  = var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to rupee_indian_rupee_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
							multiply = var:rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_rupee_indian_rupee_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_rupee_indian_rupee_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:rupee_indian_rupee_order = 5
				var:rupee_indian_rupee_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_sell_5 #Player country quantity of rupee_indian_rupee buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_buy_5 #Player country quantity of rupee_indian_rupee buy
					value  = var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to rupee_indian_rupee_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
							multiply = var:rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_rupee_indian_rupee_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_rupee_indian_rupee_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:rupee_indian_rupee_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = rupee_indian_rupee_order
				#Player country quantity of rupee_indian_rupee buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_rupee_indian_rupee_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:rupee_indian_rupee_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = rupee_indian_rupee_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:rupee_indian_rupee_order = 1
				var:rupee_indian_rupee_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_sell_1 #Player country quantity of rupee_indian_rupee sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_sell_1 #Player country quantity of rupee_indian_rupee sell
					value  = var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to rupee_indian_rupee_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
							multiply = var:rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_rupee_indian_rupee_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_rupee_indian_rupee_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:rupee_indian_rupee_order = 2
				var:rupee_indian_rupee_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_sell_2 #Player country quantity of rupee_indian_rupee sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_sell_2 #Player country quantity of rupee_indian_rupee sell
					value  = var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to rupee_indian_rupee_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
							multiply = var:rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_rupee_indian_rupee_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_rupee_indian_rupee_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:rupee_indian_rupee_order = 3
				var:rupee_indian_rupee_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_sell_3 #Player country quantity of rupee_indian_rupee sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_sell_3 #Player country quantity of rupee_indian_rupee sell
					value  = var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to rupee_indian_rupee_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
							multiply = var:rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_rupee_indian_rupee_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_rupee_indian_rupee_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:rupee_indian_rupee_order = 4
				var:rupee_indian_rupee_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_sell_4 #Player country quantity of rupee_indian_rupee sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_sell_4 #Player country quantity of rupee_indian_rupee sell
					value  = var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to rupee_indian_rupee_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
							multiply = var:rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_rupee_indian_rupee_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_rupee_indian_rupee_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:rupee_indian_rupee_order = 5
				var:rupee_indian_rupee_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_sell_5 #Player country quantity of rupee_indian_rupee sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_sell_5 #Player country quantity of rupee_indian_rupee sell
					value  = var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to rupee_indian_rupee_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indian_rupee_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
							multiply = var:rupee_indian_rupee_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_rupee_indian_rupee_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_rupee_indian_rupee_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:rupee_indian_rupee_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = rupee_indian_rupee_order
				#Player country quantity of rupee_indian_rupee sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_rupee_indian_rupee_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity < stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_rupee_indian_rupee_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_rupee_indian_rupee > 0

	}
}
sell_rupee_indian_rupee_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity < player.stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_rupee_indian_rupee_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_rupee_indian_rupee > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indian_rupee_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indian_rupee_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
rupee_indian_rupee_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_rupee_indian_rupee
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_rupee_indian_rupee
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
rupee_indian_rupee_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_rupee_indian_rupee
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state_1
						add = owner.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indian_rupee_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_rupee_indian_rupee

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#rupee_indonesian_rupiah
rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
				#var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state
				#var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
				var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state > player.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity

		money_supply_verification_rupee_indonesian_rupiah < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state > player.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_order = 1
				var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_1 #Player country quantity of rupee_indonesian_rupiah buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_buy_1 #Player country quantity of rupee_indonesian_rupiah buy
					value  = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to rupee_indonesian_rupiah_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
							multiply = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_order = 2
				var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_2 #Player country quantity of rupee_indonesian_rupiah buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_buy_2 #Player country quantity of rupee_indonesian_rupiah buy
					value  = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to rupee_indonesian_rupiah_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
							multiply = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_order = 3
				var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_3 #Player country quantity of rupee_indonesian_rupiah buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_buy_3 #Player country quantity of rupee_indonesian_rupiah buy
					value  = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to rupee_indonesian_rupiah_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
							multiply = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_order = 4
				var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_4 #Player country quantity of rupee_indonesian_rupiah buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_buy_4 #Player country quantity of rupee_indonesian_rupiah buy
					value  = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to rupee_indonesian_rupiah_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
							multiply = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_order = 5
				var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_5 #Player country quantity of rupee_indonesian_rupiah buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_buy_5 #Player country quantity of rupee_indonesian_rupiah buy
					value  = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to rupee_indonesian_rupiah_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
							multiply = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_order
				#Player country quantity of rupee_indonesian_rupiah buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_order = 1
				var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_1 #Player country quantity of rupee_indonesian_rupiah sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_1 #Player country quantity of rupee_indonesian_rupiah sell
					value  = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to rupee_indonesian_rupiah_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
							multiply = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_order = 2
				var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_2 #Player country quantity of rupee_indonesian_rupiah sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_2 #Player country quantity of rupee_indonesian_rupiah sell
					value  = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to rupee_indonesian_rupiah_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
							multiply = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_order = 3
				var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_3 #Player country quantity of rupee_indonesian_rupiah sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_3 #Player country quantity of rupee_indonesian_rupiah sell
					value  = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to rupee_indonesian_rupiah_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
							multiply = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_order = 4
				var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_4 #Player country quantity of rupee_indonesian_rupiah sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_4 #Player country quantity of rupee_indonesian_rupiah sell
					value  = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to rupee_indonesian_rupiah_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
							multiply = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_order = 5
				var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_5 #Player country quantity of rupee_indonesian_rupiah sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_5 #Player country quantity of rupee_indonesian_rupiah sell
					value  = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to rupee_indonesian_rupiah_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
							multiply = var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_order
				#Player country quantity of rupee_indonesian_rupiah sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity < stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_rupee_indonesian_rupiah > 0

	}
}
sell_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity < player.stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_rupee_indonesian_rupiah > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_rupee_indonesian_rupiah
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_rupee_indonesian_rupiah
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
rupee_indonesian_rupiah_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_rupee_indonesian_rupiah
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
						add = owner.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:rupee_indonesian_rupiah_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_rupee_indonesian_rupiah

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#spe_baht
spe_baht_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = spe_baht_quantity
				#var:spe_baht_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_spe_baht_state
				#var:spe_baht_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:spe_baht_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = spe_baht_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_baht_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = spe_baht_quantity
				var:spe_baht_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = spe_baht_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_spe_baht_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_spe_baht_state > player.var:spe_baht_quantity

		money_supply_verification_spe_baht < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:spe_baht_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_spe_baht_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_baht_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_spe_baht_state > player.var:spe_baht_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_spe_baht_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_spe_baht_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_spe_baht_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_spe_baht_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:spe_baht_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = spe_baht_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_baht_order = 1
				var:spe_baht_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_sell_1 #Player country quantity of spe_baht buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_baht_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_baht_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_buy_1 #Player country quantity of spe_baht buy
					value  = var:spe_baht_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_baht_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_baht_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_baht_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_baht_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_baht_order = 2
				var:spe_baht_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_sell_2 #Player country quantity of spe_baht buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_baht_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_baht_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_buy_2 #Player country quantity of spe_baht buy
					value  = var:spe_baht_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_baht_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_baht_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_baht_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_baht_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_baht_order = 3
				var:spe_baht_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_sell_3 #Player country quantity of spe_baht buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_baht_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_baht_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_buy_3 #Player country quantity of spe_baht buy
					value  = var:spe_baht_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_baht_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_baht_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_baht_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_baht_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_baht_order = 4
				var:spe_baht_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_sell_4 #Player country quantity of spe_baht buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_baht_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_baht_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_buy_4 #Player country quantity of spe_baht buy
					value  = var:spe_baht_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_baht_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_baht_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_baht_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_baht_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_baht_order = 5
				var:spe_baht_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_sell_5 #Player country quantity of spe_baht buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_baht_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_baht_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_buy_5 #Player country quantity of spe_baht buy
					value  = var:spe_baht_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_baht_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_baht_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_baht_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_baht_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_baht_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = spe_baht_order
				#Player country quantity of spe_baht buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_baht_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:spe_baht_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = spe_baht_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_baht_order = 1
				var:spe_baht_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_sell_1 #Player country quantity of spe_baht sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_baht_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_baht_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_sell_1 #Player country quantity of spe_baht sell
					value  = var:spe_baht_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_baht_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_baht_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_baht_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_baht_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_baht_order = 2
				var:spe_baht_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_sell_2 #Player country quantity of spe_baht sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_baht_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_baht_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_sell_2 #Player country quantity of spe_baht sell
					value  = var:spe_baht_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_baht_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_baht_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_baht_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_baht_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_baht_order = 3
				var:spe_baht_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_sell_3 #Player country quantity of spe_baht sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_baht_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_baht_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_sell_3 #Player country quantity of spe_baht sell
					value  = var:spe_baht_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_baht_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_baht_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_baht_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_baht_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_baht_order = 4
				var:spe_baht_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_sell_4 #Player country quantity of spe_baht sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_baht_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_baht_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_sell_4 #Player country quantity of spe_baht sell
					value  = var:spe_baht_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_baht_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_baht_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_baht_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_baht_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_baht_order = 5
				var:spe_baht_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_sell_5 #Player country quantity of spe_baht sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_baht_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_baht_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_sell_5 #Player country quantity of spe_baht sell
					value  = var:spe_baht_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_baht_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_baht_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_baht_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_baht_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_baht_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_baht_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_baht_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = spe_baht_order
				#Player country quantity of spe_baht sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_spe_baht_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:spe_baht_quantity < stockpiling_spe_baht_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_spe_baht_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_spe_baht > 0

	}
}
sell_spe_baht_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:spe_baht_quantity < player.stockpiling_spe_baht_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_spe_baht_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_spe_baht > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_spe_baht_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_baht_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_baht_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_baht_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:spe_baht_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:spe_baht_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_spe_baht
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_baht_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:spe_baht_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:spe_baht_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_spe_baht
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_baht_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_baht_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:spe_baht_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:spe_baht_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_spe_baht
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_baht_state_1
						add = owner.var:spe_baht_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:spe_baht_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_spe_baht

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#spe_dong
spe_dong_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = spe_dong_quantity
				#var:spe_dong_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_spe_dong_state
				#var:spe_dong_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:spe_dong_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = spe_dong_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_dong_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = spe_dong_quantity
				var:spe_dong_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = spe_dong_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_spe_dong_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_spe_dong_state > player.var:spe_dong_quantity

		money_supply_verification_spe_dong < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:spe_dong_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_spe_dong_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_dong_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_spe_dong_state > player.var:spe_dong_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_spe_dong_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_spe_dong_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_spe_dong_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_spe_dong_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:spe_dong_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = spe_dong_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_dong_order = 1
				var:spe_dong_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_sell_1 #Player country quantity of spe_dong buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_dong_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
