							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_dong_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_buy_1 #Player country quantity of spe_dong buy
					value  = var:spe_dong_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_dong_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_dong_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_dong_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_dong_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_dong_order = 2
				var:spe_dong_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_sell_2 #Player country quantity of spe_dong buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_dong_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_dong_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_buy_2 #Player country quantity of spe_dong buy
					value  = var:spe_dong_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_dong_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_dong_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_dong_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_dong_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_dong_order = 3
				var:spe_dong_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_sell_3 #Player country quantity of spe_dong buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_dong_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_dong_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_buy_3 #Player country quantity of spe_dong buy
					value  = var:spe_dong_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_dong_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_dong_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_dong_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_dong_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_dong_order = 4
				var:spe_dong_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_sell_4 #Player country quantity of spe_dong buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_dong_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_dong_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_buy_4 #Player country quantity of spe_dong buy
					value  = var:spe_dong_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_dong_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_dong_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_dong_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_dong_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_dong_order = 5
				var:spe_dong_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_sell_5 #Player country quantity of spe_dong buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_dong_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_dong_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_buy_5 #Player country quantity of spe_dong buy
					value  = var:spe_dong_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_dong_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_dong_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_dong_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_dong_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_dong_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = spe_dong_order
				#Player country quantity of spe_dong buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_dong_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:spe_dong_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = spe_dong_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_dong_order = 1
				var:spe_dong_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_sell_1 #Player country quantity of spe_dong sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_dong_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_dong_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_sell_1 #Player country quantity of spe_dong sell
					value  = var:spe_dong_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_dong_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_dong_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_dong_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_dong_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_dong_order = 2
				var:spe_dong_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_sell_2 #Player country quantity of spe_dong sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_dong_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_dong_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_sell_2 #Player country quantity of spe_dong sell
					value  = var:spe_dong_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_dong_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_dong_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_dong_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_dong_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_dong_order = 3
				var:spe_dong_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_sell_3 #Player country quantity of spe_dong sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_dong_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_dong_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_sell_3 #Player country quantity of spe_dong sell
					value  = var:spe_dong_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_dong_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_dong_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_dong_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_dong_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_dong_order = 4
				var:spe_dong_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_sell_4 #Player country quantity of spe_dong sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_dong_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_dong_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_sell_4 #Player country quantity of spe_dong sell
					value  = var:spe_dong_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_dong_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_dong_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_dong_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_dong_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_dong_order = 5
				var:spe_dong_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_sell_5 #Player country quantity of spe_dong sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_dong_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_dong_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_sell_5 #Player country quantity of spe_dong sell
					value  = var:spe_dong_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_dong_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_dong_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_dong_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_dong_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_dong_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_dong_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_dong_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = spe_dong_order
				#Player country quantity of spe_dong sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_spe_dong_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:spe_dong_quantity < stockpiling_spe_dong_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_spe_dong_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_spe_dong > 0

	}
}
sell_spe_dong_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:spe_dong_quantity < player.stockpiling_spe_dong_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_spe_dong_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_spe_dong > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_spe_dong_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_dong_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_dong_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_dong_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:spe_dong_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:spe_dong_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_spe_dong
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_dong_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:spe_dong_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:spe_dong_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_spe_dong
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_dong_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_dong_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:spe_dong_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:spe_dong_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_spe_dong
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_dong_state_1
						add = owner.var:spe_dong_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:spe_dong_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_spe_dong

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#spe_drachma
spe_drachma_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = spe_drachma_quantity
				#var:spe_drachma_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_spe_drachma_state
				#var:spe_drachma_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:spe_drachma_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = spe_drachma_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_drachma_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = spe_drachma_quantity
				var:spe_drachma_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = spe_drachma_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_spe_drachma_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_spe_drachma_state > player.var:spe_drachma_quantity

		money_supply_verification_spe_drachma < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:spe_drachma_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_spe_drachma_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_drachma_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_spe_drachma_state > player.var:spe_drachma_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_spe_drachma_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_spe_drachma_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_spe_drachma_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_spe_drachma_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:spe_drachma_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = spe_drachma_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_drachma_order = 1
				var:spe_drachma_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_sell_1 #Player country quantity of spe_drachma buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_drachma_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_drachma_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_buy_1 #Player country quantity of spe_drachma buy
					value  = var:spe_drachma_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_drachma_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_drachma_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_drachma_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_drachma_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_drachma_order = 2
				var:spe_drachma_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_sell_2 #Player country quantity of spe_drachma buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_drachma_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_drachma_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_buy_2 #Player country quantity of spe_drachma buy
					value  = var:spe_drachma_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_drachma_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_drachma_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_drachma_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_drachma_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_drachma_order = 3
				var:spe_drachma_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_sell_3 #Player country quantity of spe_drachma buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_drachma_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_drachma_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_buy_3 #Player country quantity of spe_drachma buy
					value  = var:spe_drachma_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_drachma_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_drachma_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_drachma_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_drachma_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_drachma_order = 4
				var:spe_drachma_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_sell_4 #Player country quantity of spe_drachma buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_drachma_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_drachma_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_buy_4 #Player country quantity of spe_drachma buy
					value  = var:spe_drachma_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_drachma_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_drachma_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_drachma_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_drachma_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_drachma_order = 5
				var:spe_drachma_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_sell_5 #Player country quantity of spe_drachma buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_drachma_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_drachma_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_buy_5 #Player country quantity of spe_drachma buy
					value  = var:spe_drachma_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_drachma_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_drachma_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_drachma_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_drachma_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_drachma_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = spe_drachma_order
				#Player country quantity of spe_drachma buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_drachma_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:spe_drachma_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = spe_drachma_order
			add = 1
		}

			limit = {
				var:spe_drachma_order = 1
				var:spe_drachma_sell_1 = 0

					}

						value = 0

							multiply = {

						}
					}

						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_drachma_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_drachma_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_drachma_order = 2
				var:spe_drachma_sell_2 = 0
			}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_sell_2 #Player country quantity of spe_drachma sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_drachma_quantity

				#exchange rate

					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0

							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_drachma_quantity
							multiply = {

									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_sell_2 #Player country quantity of spe_drachma sell
					value  = var:spe_drachma_quantity

					value = scope:target.var:spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_drachma_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0

							multiply = var:spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2

					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_drachma_quantity

					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_drachma_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_sell_3 #Player country quantity of spe_drachma sell
					value  = var:spe_drachma_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_drachma_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_drachma_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_drachma_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_drachma_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_drachma_order = 4
				var:spe_drachma_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_sell_4 #Player country quantity of spe_drachma sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_drachma_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate

					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_drachma_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_sell_4 #Player country quantity of spe_drachma sell
					value  = var:spe_drachma_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_drachma_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_drachma_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_drachma_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_drachma_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_drachma_order = 5
				var:spe_drachma_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_sell_5 #Player country quantity of spe_drachma sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_drachma_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_drachma_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_sell_5 #Player country quantity of spe_drachma sell
					value  = var:spe_drachma_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_drachma_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_drachma_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_drachma_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_drachma_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_drachma_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_drachma_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_drachma_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = spe_drachma_order
				#Player country quantity of spe_drachma sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_spe_drachma_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:spe_drachma_quantity < stockpiling_spe_drachma_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_spe_drachma_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_spe_drachma > 0

	}
}
sell_spe_drachma_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:spe_drachma_quantity < player.stockpiling_spe_drachma_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_spe_drachma_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_spe_drachma > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_spe_drachma_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_drachma_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_drachma_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:spe_drachma_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:spe_drachma_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_spe_drachma
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:spe_drachma_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:spe_drachma_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_spe_drachma
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_drachma_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:spe_drachma_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:spe_drachma_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_spe_drachma
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_state_1
						add = owner.var:spe_drachma_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:spe_drachma_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_spe_drachma

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#spe_korean_won
spe_korean_won_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = spe_korean_won_quantity
				#var:spe_korean_won_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state
				#var:spe_korean_won_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:spe_korean_won_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = spe_korean_won_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_korean_won_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = spe_korean_won_quantity
				var:spe_korean_won_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = spe_korean_won_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_spe_korean_won_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state > player.var:spe_korean_won_quantity

		money_supply_verification_spe_korean_won < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:spe_korean_won_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_spe_korean_won_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_korean_won_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state > player.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_spe_korean_won_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_spe_korean_won_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_spe_korean_won_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_spe_korean_won_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:spe_korean_won_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = spe_korean_won_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_korean_won_order = 1
				var:spe_korean_won_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_sell_1 #Player country quantity of spe_korean_won buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_buy_1 #Player country quantity of spe_korean_won buy
					value  = var:spe_korean_won_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_korean_won_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_korean_won_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_korean_won_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_korean_won_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_korean_won_order = 2
				var:spe_korean_won_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_sell_2 #Player country quantity of spe_korean_won buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_buy_2 #Player country quantity of spe_korean_won buy
					value  = var:spe_korean_won_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_korean_won_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_korean_won_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_korean_won_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_korean_won_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_korean_won_order = 3
				var:spe_korean_won_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_sell_3 #Player country quantity of spe_korean_won buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_buy_3 #Player country quantity of spe_korean_won buy
					value  = var:spe_korean_won_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_korean_won_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_korean_won_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_korean_won_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_korean_won_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_korean_won_order = 4
				var:spe_korean_won_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_sell_4 #Player country quantity of spe_korean_won buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_buy_4 #Player country quantity of spe_korean_won buy
					value  = var:spe_korean_won_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_korean_won_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_korean_won_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_korean_won_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_korean_won_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_korean_won_order = 5
				var:spe_korean_won_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_sell_5 #Player country quantity of spe_korean_won buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_buy_5 #Player country quantity of spe_korean_won buy
					value  = var:spe_korean_won_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_korean_won_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_korean_won_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_korean_won_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_korean_won_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_korean_won_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = spe_korean_won_order
				#Player country quantity of spe_korean_won buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_korean_won_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:spe_korean_won_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = spe_korean_won_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_korean_won_order = 1
				var:spe_korean_won_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_sell_1 #Player country quantity of spe_korean_won sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_sell_1 #Player country quantity of spe_korean_won sell
					value  = var:spe_korean_won_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_korean_won_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_korean_won_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_korean_won_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_korean_won_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_korean_won_order = 2
				var:spe_korean_won_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_sell_2 #Player country quantity of spe_korean_won sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_sell_2 #Player country quantity of spe_korean_won sell
					value  = var:spe_korean_won_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_korean_won_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_korean_won_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_korean_won_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_korean_won_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_korean_won_order = 3
				var:spe_korean_won_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_sell_3 #Player country quantity of spe_korean_won sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_sell_3 #Player country quantity of spe_korean_won sell
					value  = var:spe_korean_won_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_korean_won_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_korean_won_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_korean_won_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_korean_won_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_korean_won_order = 4
				var:spe_korean_won_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_sell_4 #Player country quantity of spe_korean_won sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_sell_4 #Player country quantity of spe_korean_won sell
					value  = var:spe_korean_won_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_korean_won_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_korean_won_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_korean_won_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_korean_won_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_korean_won_order = 5
				var:spe_korean_won_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_sell_5 #Player country quantity of spe_korean_won sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_sell_5 #Player country quantity of spe_korean_won sell
					value  = var:spe_korean_won_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_korean_won_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_korean_won_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_korean_won_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_korean_won_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_korean_won_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_korean_won_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_korean_won_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = spe_korean_won_order
				#Player country quantity of spe_korean_won sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_spe_korean_won_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:spe_korean_won_quantity < stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_spe_korean_won_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_spe_korean_won > 0

	}
}
sell_spe_korean_won_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:spe_korean_won_quantity < player.stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_spe_korean_won_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_spe_korean_won > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_spe_korean_won_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_korean_won_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_korean_won_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_spe_korean_won
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_spe_korean_won
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_korean_won_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_spe_korean_won
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state_1
						add = owner.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:spe_korean_won_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_spe_korean_won

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#spe_latvian_lats
spe_latvian_lats_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = spe_latvian_lats_quantity
				#var:spe_latvian_lats_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state
				#var:spe_latvian_lats_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:spe_latvian_lats_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = spe_latvian_lats_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_latvian_lats_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = spe_latvian_lats_quantity
				var:spe_latvian_lats_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = spe_latvian_lats_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_spe_latvian_lats_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state > player.var:spe_latvian_lats_quantity

		money_supply_verification_spe_latvian_lats < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:spe_latvian_lats_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_spe_latvian_lats_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_latvian_lats_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state > player.var:spe_latvian_lats_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_spe_latvian_lats_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_spe_latvian_lats_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_spe_latvian_lats_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_spe_latvian_lats_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:spe_latvian_lats_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = spe_latvian_lats_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_latvian_lats_order = 1
				var:spe_latvian_lats_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_latvian_lats_sell_1 #Player country quantity of spe_latvian_lats buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_latvian_lats_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_latvian_lats_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_latvian_lats_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_latvian_lats_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_latvian_lats_buy_1 #Player country quantity of spe_latvian_lats buy
					value  = var:spe_latvian_lats_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_latvian_lats_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:spe_latvian_lats_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_latvian_lats_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_latvian_lats_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_latvian_lats_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_latvian_lats_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_latvian_lats_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_latvian_lats_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_latvian_lats_order = 2
				var:spe_latvian_lats_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_latvian_lats_sell_2 #Player country quantity of spe_latvian_lats buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_latvian_lats_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_latvian_lats_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_latvian_lats_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_latvian_lats_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_latvian_lats_buy_2 #Player country quantity of spe_latvian_lats buy
					value  = var:spe_latvian_lats_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_latvian_lats_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:spe_latvian_lats_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_latvian_lats_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_latvian_lats_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_latvian_lats_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_latvian_lats_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_latvian_lats_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_latvian_lats_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_latvian_lats_order = 3
				var:spe_latvian_lats_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_latvian_lats_sell_3 #Player country quantity of spe_latvian_lats buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_latvian_lats_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_latvian_lats_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_latvian_lats_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_latvian_lats_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_latvian_lats_buy_3 #Player country quantity of spe_latvian_lats buy
					value  = var:spe_latvian_lats_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_latvian_lats_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:spe_latvian_lats_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_latvian_lats_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_latvian_lats_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_latvian_lats_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_latvian_lats_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_latvian_lats_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_latvian_lats_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_latvian_lats_order = 4
				var:spe_latvian_lats_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_latvian_lats_sell_4 #Player country quantity of spe_latvian_lats buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_latvian_lats_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_latvian_lats_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_latvian_lats_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_latvian_lats_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_latvian_lats_buy_4 #Player country quantity of spe_latvian_lats buy
