							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_ruble_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_buy_5 #Player country quantity of spe_ruble buy
					value  = var:spe_ruble_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:spe_ruble_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_ruble_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_ruble_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_ruble_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_ruble_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_ruble_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_ruble_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = spe_ruble_order
				#Player country quantity of spe_ruble buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_ruble_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:spe_ruble_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = spe_ruble_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_ruble_order = 1
				var:spe_ruble_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_sell_1 #Player country quantity of spe_ruble sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_ruble_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_ruble_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_sell_1 #Player country quantity of spe_ruble sell
					value  = var:spe_ruble_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:spe_ruble_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_ruble_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_ruble_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_ruble_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_ruble_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_ruble_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_ruble_order = 2
				var:spe_ruble_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_sell_2 #Player country quantity of spe_ruble sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_ruble_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_ruble_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_sell_2 #Player country quantity of spe_ruble sell
					value  = var:spe_ruble_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:spe_ruble_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_ruble_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_ruble_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_ruble_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_ruble_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_ruble_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_ruble_order = 3
				var:spe_ruble_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_sell_3 #Player country quantity of spe_ruble sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_ruble_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_ruble_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_sell_3 #Player country quantity of spe_ruble sell
					value  = var:spe_ruble_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:spe_ruble_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_ruble_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_ruble_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_ruble_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_ruble_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_ruble_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_ruble_order = 4
				var:spe_ruble_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_sell_4 #Player country quantity of spe_ruble sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_ruble_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_ruble_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_sell_4 #Player country quantity of spe_ruble sell
					value  = var:spe_ruble_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:spe_ruble_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_ruble_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_ruble_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_ruble_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_ruble_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_ruble_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_ruble_order = 5
				var:spe_ruble_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_sell_5 #Player country quantity of spe_ruble sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_ruble_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_ruble_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_sell_5 #Player country quantity of spe_ruble sell
					value  = var:spe_ruble_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:spe_ruble_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_ruble_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_ruble_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_ruble_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_ruble_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_ruble_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_ruble_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = spe_ruble_order
				#Player country quantity of spe_ruble sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_spe_ruble_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:spe_ruble_quantity < stockpiling_spe_ruble_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_spe_ruble_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_spe_ruble > 0

	}
}
sell_spe_ruble_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:spe_ruble_quantity < player.stockpiling_spe_ruble_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_spe_ruble_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_spe_ruble > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_spe_ruble_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_ruble_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_ruble_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:spe_ruble_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:spe_ruble_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_spe_ruble
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:spe_ruble_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:spe_ruble_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_spe_ruble
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_ruble_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:spe_ruble_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:spe_ruble_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_spe_ruble
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_state_1
						add = owner.var:spe_ruble_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:spe_ruble_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_spe_ruble

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#spe_uni
spe_uni_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = spe_uni_quantity
				#var:spe_uni_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_spe_uni_state
				#var:spe_uni_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:spe_uni_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = spe_uni_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_uni_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = spe_uni_quantity
				var:spe_uni_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = spe_uni_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_spe_uni_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_spe_uni_state > player.var:spe_uni_quantity

		money_supply_verification_spe_uni < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:spe_uni_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_spe_uni_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_uni_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_spe_uni_state > player.var:spe_uni_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_spe_uni_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_spe_uni_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_spe_uni_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_spe_uni_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:spe_uni_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = spe_uni_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_uni_order = 1
				var:spe_uni_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_sell_1 #Player country quantity of spe_uni buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_uni_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_uni_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_buy_1 #Player country quantity of spe_uni buy
					value  = var:spe_uni_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_uni_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_uni_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_uni_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_uni_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_uni_order = 2
				var:spe_uni_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_sell_2 #Player country quantity of spe_uni buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_uni_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_uni_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_buy_2 #Player country quantity of spe_uni buy
					value  = var:spe_uni_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_uni_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_uni_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_uni_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_uni_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_uni_order = 3
				var:spe_uni_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_sell_3 #Player country quantity of spe_uni buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_uni_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_uni_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_buy_3 #Player country quantity of spe_uni buy
					value  = var:spe_uni_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_uni_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_uni_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_uni_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_uni_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_uni_order = 4
				var:spe_uni_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_sell_4 #Player country quantity of spe_uni buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_uni_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_uni_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_buy_4 #Player country quantity of spe_uni buy
					value  = var:spe_uni_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_uni_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_uni_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_uni_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_uni_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_uni_order = 5
				var:spe_uni_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_sell_5 #Player country quantity of spe_uni buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_uni_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_uni_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_buy_5 #Player country quantity of spe_uni buy
					value  = var:spe_uni_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_uni_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_uni_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_uni_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_uni_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_uni_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = spe_uni_order
				#Player country quantity of spe_uni buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_uni_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:spe_uni_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = spe_uni_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_uni_order = 1
				var:spe_uni_sell_1 = 0
			}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_sell_1 #Player country quantity of spe_uni sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_uni_quantity

					name = spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_uni_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_sell_1 #Player country quantity of spe_uni sell
					value  = var:spe_uni_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate

					name = spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1

						value = 0

							add = var:spe_uni_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_uni_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_uni_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_uni_order = 2
				var:spe_uni_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_sell_2 #Player country quantity of spe_uni sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_uni_quantity

				#exchange rate

					name = spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_uni_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_sell_2 #Player country quantity of spe_uni sell
					value  = var:spe_uni_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_uni_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_uni_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_uni_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_uni_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_uni_order = 3
				var:spe_uni_sell_3 = 0
			}

					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_uni_quantity

					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_uni_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_sell_3 #Player country quantity of spe_uni sell
					value  = var:spe_uni_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_uni_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_uni_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_uni_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_uni_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_uni_order = 4
				var:spe_uni_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_sell_4 #Player country quantity of spe_uni sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_uni_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_uni_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_sell_4 #Player country quantity of spe_uni sell
					value  = var:spe_uni_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_uni_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_uni_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_uni_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_uni_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_uni_order = 5
				var:spe_uni_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_sell_5 #Player country quantity of spe_uni sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_uni_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_uni_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_sell_5 #Player country quantity of spe_uni sell
					value  = var:spe_uni_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_uni_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_uni_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_uni_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_uni_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_uni_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_uni_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = spe_uni_order
				#Player country quantity of spe_uni sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_spe_uni_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:spe_uni_quantity < stockpiling_spe_uni_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_spe_uni_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_spe_uni > 0

	}
}
sell_spe_uni_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:spe_uni_quantity < player.stockpiling_spe_uni_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_spe_uni_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_spe_uni > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_spe_uni_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_uni_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_uni_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:spe_uni_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:spe_uni_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_spe_uni
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:spe_uni_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:spe_uni_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_spe_uni
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_uni_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:spe_uni_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:spe_uni_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_spe_uni
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1
						add = owner.var:spe_uni_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:spe_uni_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_spe_uni

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#spe_yen
spe_yen_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = spe_yen_quantity
				#var:spe_yen_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_spe_yen_state
				#var:spe_yen_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:spe_yen_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = spe_yen_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_yen_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = spe_yen_quantity
				var:spe_yen_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = spe_yen_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_spe_yen_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_spe_yen_state > player.var:spe_yen_quantity

		money_supply_verification_spe_yen < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:spe_yen_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_spe_yen_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_yen_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_spe_yen_state > player.var:spe_yen_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_spe_yen_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_spe_yen_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_spe_yen_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_spe_yen_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:spe_yen_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = spe_yen_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_yen_order = 1
				var:spe_yen_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_sell_1 #Player country quantity of spe_yen buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_yen_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_yen_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_buy_1 #Player country quantity of spe_yen buy
					value  = var:spe_yen_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_yen_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_yen_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_yen_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_yen_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_yen_order = 2
				var:spe_yen_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_sell_2 #Player country quantity of spe_yen buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_yen_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_yen_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_buy_2 #Player country quantity of spe_yen buy
					value  = var:spe_yen_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_yen_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_yen_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_yen_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_yen_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_yen_order = 3
				var:spe_yen_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_sell_3 #Player country quantity of spe_yen buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_yen_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_yen_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_buy_3 #Player country quantity of spe_yen buy
					value  = var:spe_yen_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_yen_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_yen_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_yen_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_yen_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_yen_order = 4
				var:spe_yen_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_sell_4 #Player country quantity of spe_yen buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_yen_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_yen_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_buy_4 #Player country quantity of spe_yen buy
					value  = var:spe_yen_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_yen_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_yen_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_yen_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_yen_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_yen_order = 5
				var:spe_yen_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_sell_5 #Player country quantity of spe_yen buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_yen_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_yen_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_buy_5 #Player country quantity of spe_yen buy
					value  = var:spe_yen_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_yen_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_yen_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_yen_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_yen_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_yen_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = spe_yen_order
				#Player country quantity of spe_yen buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_yen_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:spe_yen_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = spe_yen_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_yen_order = 1
				var:spe_yen_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_sell_1 #Player country quantity of spe_yen sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_yen_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_yen_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_sell_1 #Player country quantity of spe_yen sell
					value  = var:spe_yen_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_yen_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_yen_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_yen_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_yen_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_yen_order = 2
				var:spe_yen_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_sell_2 #Player country quantity of spe_yen sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_yen_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_yen_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_sell_2 #Player country quantity of spe_yen sell
					value  = var:spe_yen_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_yen_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_yen_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_yen_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_yen_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_yen_order = 3
				var:spe_yen_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_sell_3 #Player country quantity of spe_yen sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_yen_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_yen_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_sell_3 #Player country quantity of spe_yen sell
					value  = var:spe_yen_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_yen_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_yen_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_yen_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_yen_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_yen_order = 4
				var:spe_yen_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_sell_4 #Player country quantity of spe_yen sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_yen_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_yen_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_sell_4 #Player country quantity of spe_yen sell
					value  = var:spe_yen_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_yen_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_yen_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_yen_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_yen_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_yen_order = 5
				var:spe_yen_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_sell_5 #Player country quantity of spe_yen sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_yen_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_yen_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_sell_5 #Player country quantity of spe_yen sell
					value  = var:spe_yen_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_yen_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_yen_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_yen_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_yen_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_yen_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_yen_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = spe_yen_order
				#Player country quantity of spe_yen sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_spe_yen_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:spe_yen_quantity < stockpiling_spe_yen_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_spe_yen_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_spe_yen > 0

	}
}
sell_spe_yen_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:spe_yen_quantity < player.stockpiling_spe_yen_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_spe_yen_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_spe_yen > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_spe_yen_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_yen_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_yen_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:spe_yen_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:spe_yen_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_spe_yen
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:spe_yen_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:spe_yen_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_spe_yen
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_yen_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:spe_yen_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:spe_yen_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_spe_yen
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1
						add = owner.var:spe_yen_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:spe_yen_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_spe_yen

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#spe_yuan
spe_yuan_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = spe_yuan_quantity
				#var:spe_yuan_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_spe_yuan_state
				#var:spe_yuan_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:spe_yuan_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = spe_yuan_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_yuan_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = spe_yuan_quantity
				var:spe_yuan_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = spe_yuan_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_spe_yuan_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_spe_yuan_state > player.var:spe_yuan_quantity

		money_supply_verification_spe_yuan < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:spe_yuan_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_spe_yuan_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_yuan_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_spe_yuan_state > player.var:spe_yuan_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_spe_yuan_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_spe_yuan_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_spe_yuan_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_spe_yuan_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:spe_yuan_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = spe_yuan_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_yuan_order = 1
				var:spe_yuan_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_sell_1 #Player country quantity of spe_yuan buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_yuan_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_yuan_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_buy_1 #Player country quantity of spe_yuan buy
					value  = var:spe_yuan_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_yuan_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_yuan_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_yuan_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_yuan_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_yuan_order = 2
				var:spe_yuan_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_sell_2 #Player country quantity of spe_yuan buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_yuan_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_yuan_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_buy_2 #Player country quantity of spe_yuan buy
					value  = var:spe_yuan_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_yuan_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_yuan_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_yuan_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_yuan_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_yuan_order = 3
				var:spe_yuan_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_sell_3 #Player country quantity of spe_yuan buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_yuan_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_yuan_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_buy_3 #Player country quantity of spe_yuan buy
					value  = var:spe_yuan_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_yuan_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_yuan_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_yuan_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_yuan_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_yuan_order = 4
				var:spe_yuan_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_sell_4 #Player country quantity of spe_yuan buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_yuan_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_yuan_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_buy_4 #Player country quantity of spe_yuan buy
					value  = var:spe_yuan_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_yuan_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_yuan_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_yuan_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_yuan_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_yuan_order = 5
				var:spe_yuan_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_sell_5 #Player country quantity of spe_yuan buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_yuan_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_yuan_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_buy_5 #Player country quantity of spe_yuan buy
					value  = var:spe_yuan_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_yuan_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_yuan_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_spe_yuan_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_yuan_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_yuan_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = spe_yuan_order
				#Player country quantity of spe_yuan buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_yuan_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:spe_yuan_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = spe_yuan_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_yuan_order = 1
				var:spe_yuan_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_sell_1 #Player country quantity of spe_yuan sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_yuan_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_yuan_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_sell_1 #Player country quantity of spe_yuan sell
					value  = var:spe_yuan_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_yuan_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_yuan_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_yuan_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_yuan_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_yuan_order = 2
				var:spe_yuan_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_sell_2 #Player country quantity of spe_yuan sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_yuan_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_yuan_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_sell_2 #Player country quantity of spe_yuan sell
					value  = var:spe_yuan_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_yuan_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_yuan_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_yuan_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_yuan_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_yuan_order = 3
				var:spe_yuan_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_sell_3 #Player country quantity of spe_yuan sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_yuan_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:spe_yuan_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_sell_3 #Player country quantity of spe_yuan sell
					value  = var:spe_yuan_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to spe_yuan_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:spe_yuan_quantity
							multiply = var:spe_yuan_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_spe_yuan_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_spe_yuan_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:spe_yuan_order = 4
				var:spe_yuan_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_sell_4 #Player country quantity of spe_yuan sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:spe_yuan_quantity
				}
