					name = thaler_prussian_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:thaler_prussian_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to thaler_prussian_thaler_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_prussian_thaler_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:thaler_prussian_thaler_quantity
							multiply = var:thaler_prussian_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_thaler_prussian_thaler_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_thaler_prussian_thaler_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:thaler_prussian_thaler_order = 4
				var:thaler_prussian_thaler_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_prussian_thaler_sell_4 #Player country quantity of thaler_prussian_thaler sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:thaler_prussian_thaler_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_prussian_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_prussian_thaler_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:thaler_prussian_thaler_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_prussian_thaler_sell_4 #Player country quantity of thaler_prussian_thaler sell
					value  = var:thaler_prussian_thaler_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_prussian_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:thaler_prussian_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to thaler_prussian_thaler_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_prussian_thaler_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:thaler_prussian_thaler_quantity
							multiply = var:thaler_prussian_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_thaler_prussian_thaler_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_thaler_prussian_thaler_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:thaler_prussian_thaler_order = 5
				var:thaler_prussian_thaler_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_prussian_thaler_sell_5 #Player country quantity of thaler_prussian_thaler sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:thaler_prussian_thaler_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_prussian_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_prussian_thaler_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:thaler_prussian_thaler_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_prussian_thaler_sell_5 #Player country quantity of thaler_prussian_thaler sell
					value  = var:thaler_prussian_thaler_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_prussian_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:thaler_prussian_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to thaler_prussian_thaler_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_prussian_thaler_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:thaler_prussian_thaler_quantity
							multiply = var:thaler_prussian_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_thaler_prussian_thaler_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_thaler_prussian_thaler_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:thaler_prussian_thaler_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = thaler_prussian_thaler_order
				#Player country quantity of thaler_prussian_thaler sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_thaler_prussian_thaler_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:thaler_prussian_thaler_quantity < stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_thaler_prussian_thaler_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_thaler_prussian_thaler > 0

	}
}
sell_thaler_prussian_thaler_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:thaler_prussian_thaler_quantity < player.stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_thaler_prussian_thaler_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_thaler_prussian_thaler > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
thaler_prussian_thaler_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:thaler_prussian_thaler_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:thaler_prussian_thaler_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_thaler_prussian_thaler
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:thaler_prussian_thaler_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:thaler_prussian_thaler_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_thaler_prussian_thaler
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
thaler_prussian_thaler_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:thaler_prussian_thaler_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:thaler_prussian_thaler_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_thaler_prussian_thaler
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1
						add = owner.var:thaler_prussian_thaler_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:thaler_prussian_thaler_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_thaler_prussian_thaler

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#thaler_saxon_thaler
thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
				#var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state
				#var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
				var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_currency
buy_thaler_saxon_thaler_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state > player.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity

		money_supply_verification_thaler_saxon_thaler < player.money_supply_state #verifi avec les odre en cour + la quantité actuel désirée que la reserve actuel du joueur soit suffisante
		player.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verifit si la limite fixe est inferieur à la quantité demander de devise etrangère
		sell_limit_currency_var_current < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0 #verification de si le total de devise etrangère demander est inferieur à la limite de par exemple 100M
		not = {
			player.buy_thaler_saxon_thaler_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
	}
}
sell_thaler_saxon_thaler_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state > player.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_thaler_saxon_thaler_order_valid = 0
			# player = {
			# 	has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			# }
		}
		sell_thaler_saxon_thaler_market_panel_verification = 1 #cella verifit la quantité de currency du joueur détenue par le pays ciblé mais uniquement une fois que l'odre est passé
		sell_thaler_saxon_thaler_market_panel_verification_current = 1

	}
}
buy_thaler_saxon_thaler_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:thaler_saxon_thaler_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = thaler_saxon_thaler_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:thaler_saxon_thaler_order = 1
				var:thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_1 #Player country quantity of thaler_saxon_thaler buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_buy_1 #Player country quantity of thaler_saxon_thaler buy
					value  = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to thaler_saxon_thaler_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
							multiply = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_thaler_saxon_thaler_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_thaler_saxon_thaler_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:thaler_saxon_thaler_order = 2
				var:thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_2 #Player country quantity of thaler_saxon_thaler buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_buy_2 #Player country quantity of thaler_saxon_thaler buy
					value  = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to thaler_saxon_thaler_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
							multiply = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_thaler_saxon_thaler_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_thaler_saxon_thaler_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:thaler_saxon_thaler_order = 3
				var:thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_3 #Player country quantity of thaler_saxon_thaler buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_buy_3 #Player country quantity of thaler_saxon_thaler buy
					value  = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to thaler_saxon_thaler_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
							multiply = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_thaler_saxon_thaler_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_thaler_saxon_thaler_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:thaler_saxon_thaler_order = 4
				var:thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_4 #Player country quantity of thaler_saxon_thaler buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_buy_4 #Player country quantity of thaler_saxon_thaler buy
					value  = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to thaler_saxon_thaler_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
							multiply = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_thaler_saxon_thaler_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_thaler_saxon_thaler_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:thaler_saxon_thaler_order = 5
				var:thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_5 #Player country quantity of thaler_saxon_thaler buy
					value  = scope:player_country.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_buy_5 #Player country quantity of thaler_saxon_thaler buy
					value  = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to thaler_saxon_thaler_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
							multiply = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_thaler_saxon_thaler_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_thaler_saxon_thaler_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:thaler_saxon_thaler_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = thaler_saxon_thaler_order
				#Player country quantity of thaler_saxon_thaler buy
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_thaler_saxon_thaler_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = thaler_saxon_thaler_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:thaler_saxon_thaler_order = 1
				var:thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_1 #Player country quantity of thaler_saxon_thaler sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_1 #Player country quantity of thaler_saxon_thaler sell
					value  = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to thaler_saxon_thaler_suply
				set_variable = {

					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
							multiply = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_thaler_saxon_thaler_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:thaler_saxon_thaler_order = 2
				var:thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity

					value  = scope:player_country.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate

					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_2 #Player country quantity of thaler_saxon_thaler sell
					value  = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to thaler_saxon_thaler_suply

					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
							multiply = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_thaler_saxon_thaler_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:thaler_saxon_thaler_order = 3
				var:thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_3 #Player country quantity of thaler_saxon_thaler sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_3 #Player country quantity of thaler_saxon_thaler sell
					value  = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to thaler_saxon_thaler_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
							multiply = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_thaler_saxon_thaler_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:thaler_saxon_thaler_order = 4
				var:thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_4 #Player country quantity of thaler_saxon_thaler sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_4 #Player country quantity of thaler_saxon_thaler sell
					value  = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to thaler_saxon_thaler_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
							multiply = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_thaler_saxon_thaler_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:thaler_saxon_thaler_order = 5
				var:thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_5 #Player country quantity of thaler_saxon_thaler sell
					value  = scope:player_country.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_5 #Player country quantity of thaler_saxon_thaler sell
					value  = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to thaler_saxon_thaler_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
							multiply = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_thaler_saxon_thaler_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:thaler_saxon_thaler_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = thaler_saxon_thaler_order
				#Player country quantity of thaler_saxon_thaler sell
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

#in_gold
buy_thaler_saxon_thaler_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity < stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state
		player.central_bank_gold_reserves_state > buy_thaler_saxon_thaler_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_thaler_saxon_thaler > 0

	}
}
sell_thaler_saxon_thaler_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity < player.stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_thaler_saxon_thaler_in_gold_market_panel
		money_value_thaler_saxon_thaler > 0
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency
			}
		}
	}
}
thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_thaler_saxon_thaler
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_thaler_saxon_thaler
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
thaler_saxon_thaler_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = { #subtract
						value = scope:player_country.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_thaler_saxon_thaler
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
						add = owner.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						subtract = { #subtract
							value = scope:player_country.var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.money_value_thaler_saxon_thaler

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	is_shown = {
		has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
	}
}

	is_shown = {
		has_modifier = national_stockpile_historic_place
	}
}

financial_center_historic_place = {
	is_shown = {
		has_modifier = financial_center_historic_place
	}
}

bond_in_currency_always_no = {
	is_valid = {
		always = no
	}
}

bond_in_currency_on_v = {
	is_shown = {
		var:bond_in_on = 1
	}
}
bond_in_currency_off_v = {
	is_shown = {
		var:bond_in_on = 0
	}
}
bond_in_currency_on = {
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = bond_in_on
			value = 1
		}
	}
}
bond_in_currency_off = {
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = bond_in_on
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

#dinar_algerian_dinar
choose_currency_type_dinar_algerian_dinar = {
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_dinar
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {

choose_currency_type_dinar_algerian_dinar_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dinar_algerian_dinar = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_dinar_algerian_dinar_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dinar_algerian_dinar = 0
	}
}

		}

choose_currency_type_dinar_libyan_dinar_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dinar_libyan_dinar = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_dinar_libyan_dinar_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dinar_libyan_dinar = 0
	}
}

			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_iraqi_dinar
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_libyan_dinar
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_moroccan_dirham
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_omanian_rial
			value = 1

	is_shown = {

	}
}
choose_currency_type_dinar_omanian_rial_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dinar_omanian_rial = 0
	}
}

			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_algerian_dinar

		}

		}

			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_moroccan_dirham
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_omanian_rial
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_qiran
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_saudi_riyal
			value = 1
		}

			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_serbian_dinar
			value = 0

	}

choose_currency_type_dinar_tunisian_dinar_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dinar_tunisian_dinar = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_dinar_tunisian_dinar_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dinar_tunisian_dinar = 0
	}
}

choose_currency_type_dollar_australian_dollar_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dollar_australian_dollar = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_dollar_australian_dollar_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dollar_australian_dollar = 0
	}
}

#dollar_canadian_dollar

		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_dinar
			value = 0
		}

			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_algerian_dinar
			value = 0
		}

choose_currency_type_dollar_caribbean_dollar_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dollar_caribbean_dollar = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_dollar_caribbean_dollar_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dollar_caribbean_dollar = 0
	}
}

			name = choose_currency_type_dinar

			value = 0

choose_currency_type_dollar_liberian_dollar_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dollar_liberian_dollar = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_dollar_liberian_dollar_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dollar_liberian_dollar = 0
	}
}

			name = choose_currency_type_dinar

	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar = 0
	}
}

choose_currency_type_eco_ariary_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_eco_ariary = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_eco_ariary_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_eco_ariary = 0
	}
}

choose_currency_type_eco_east_african_eco_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_eco_east_african_eco = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_eco_east_african_eco_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_eco_east_african_eco = 0
	}
}

choose_currency_type_eco_ghanaian_pound_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_eco_ghanaian_pound = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_eco_ghanaian_pound_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_eco_ghanaian_pound = 0
	}
}

	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_eco_south_african_rand = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_eco_south_african_rand_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_eco_south_african_rand = 0
	}
}

	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_eco_west_african_eco = 1
	}

	}
}

choose_currency_type_franc_french_franc_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_franc_french_franc = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_franc_french_franc_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_franc_french_franc = 0
	}
}

choose_currency_type_franc_swiss_franc_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_franc_swiss_franc = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_franc_swiss_franc_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_franc_swiss_franc = 0
	}
}

choose_currency_type_gulden_bavarian_gulden_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_gulden_bavarian_gulden = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_gulden_bavarian_gulden_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_gulden_bavarian_gulden = 0
	}
}

choose_currency_type_gulden_hungarian_forint_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_gulden_hungarian_forint = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_gulden_hungarian_forint_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_gulden_hungarian_forint = 0
	}
}

		var:choose_currency_type_krone_slovak_koruna = 1
	}

	}

}
choose_currency_type_leon_leu_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_leon_leu = 0
	}
}

choose_currency_type_lira_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_lira = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_lira_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_lira = 0
	}
}

	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_lira_ottoman_lira = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_lira_ottoman_lira_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_lira_ottoman_lira = 0
	}
}

choose_currency_type_lira_scudo_sardo_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_lira_scudo_sardo = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_lira_scudo_sardo_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_lira_scudo_sardo = 0
	}
}

choose_currency_type_mark_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_mark = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_mark_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_mark = 0
	}
}

			value = 0

			value = 0

		}

			name = choose_currency_type_thaler_saxon_thaler
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

choose_currency_type_peso_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_peso = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_peso_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_peso = 0
	}
}

			name = choose_currency_type_rupee_indian_rupee
			value = 0

		var:choose_currency_type_peso_cuban_peso = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_peso_cuban_peso_off = {

	}

		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_spe_ruble
			value = 0
		}

			value = 0

			name = choose_currency_type_spe_yen
			value = 0
		}

			name = choose_currency_type_spe_yuan
			value = 0
		}

			value = 0

			value = 0

			name = choose_currency_type_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_thaler_prussian_thaler
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_thaler_saxon_thaler
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

choose_currency_type_pound_sterling_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_pound_sterling = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_pound_sterling_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_pound_sterling = 0
	}
}

choose_currency_type_rupee_indian_rupee_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_rupee_indian_rupee = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_rupee_indian_rupee_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_rupee_indian_rupee = 0
	}
}

	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_dinar
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_algerian_dinar
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_iraqi_dinar
			value = 0

choose_currency_type_spe_baht_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_spe_baht = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_spe_baht_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_spe_baht = 0
	}
}

		}

			value = 0

			value = 0
		}

			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_moroccan_dirham
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_omanian_rial
			value = 0
		}

			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_qiran
			value = 0

		var:choose_currency_type_spe_drachma = 0
	}
}

choose_currency_type_spe_peseta_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_spe_peseta = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_spe_peseta_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_spe_peseta = 0
	}
}

choose_currency_type_spe_uni_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_spe_uni = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_spe_uni_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_spe_uni = 0
	}
}

		var:choose_currency_type_spe_yuan = 0
	}
}

}

choose_currency_type_thaler_saxon_thaler_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_thaler_saxon_thaler = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_thaler_saxon_thaler_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_thaler_saxon_thaler = 0
	}
}

money_value_dinar_visible = {
	is_shown = {
		dinar_c_global_stokpile > 0
		not = {
			root = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
			}
		}
	}
}

################################################################################################################################################################
################################################################################################################################################################
################################################################################################################################################################
################################################################################################################################################################

money_value_thaler_saxon_thaler_visible = {

	effect = {

		set_global_variable = {
			name = currency_dropdown_option_0
			value = flag:option_0
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = currency_dropdown_option_25
			value = flag:option_25
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = currency_dropdown_option_50
			value = flag:option_50
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = currency_dropdown_option_75
			value = flag:option_75
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = currency_dropdown_option_100
			value = flag:option_100
		}




		add_to_global_variable_list = {
			name = dropdown_menu_currency
			target = global_var:currency_dropdown_option_0
		}
		add_to_global_variable_list = {
			name = dropdown_menu_currency
			target = global_var:currency_dropdown_option_25
		}
		add_to_global_variable_list = {
			name = dropdown_menu_currency
			target = global_var:currency_dropdown_option_50
		}
		add_to_global_variable_list = {
			name = dropdown_menu_currency
			target = global_var:currency_dropdown_option_75
		}
		add_to_global_variable_list = {
			name = dropdown_menu_currency
			target = global_var:currency_dropdown_option_100
		}
	}
}

update_currency_liste = {
	effect = {
		currency_law_list = yes
		money_value_global_var = yes
		median_currency_value = yes
		clear_global_variable_list = dropdown_menu_currency
		if = {
			limit = {
				#money_value_dinar > 0
				dinar_c_global_stokpile > 0
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = dropdown_menu_currency
				target = global_var:currency_dropdown_dinar_01
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				#money_value_dinar_algerian_dinar > 0
				dinar_algerian_dinar_c_global_stokpile > 0
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = dropdown_menu_currency
				target = global_var:currency_dropdown_dinar_algerian_dinar_01
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				#money_value_dinar_iraqi_dinar > 0
				dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_global_stokpile > 0
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = dropdown_menu_currency
				target = global_var:currency_dropdown_dinar_iraqi_dinar_01
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				#money_value_dinar_libyan_dinar > 0
				dinar_libyan_dinar_c_global_stokpile > 0
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = dropdown_menu_currency
				target = global_var:currency_dropdown_dinar_libyan_dinar_01
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				#money_value_dinar_moroccan_dirham > 0
				dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_global_stokpile > 0
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = dropdown_menu_currency
				target = global_var:currency_dropdown_dinar_moroccan_dirham_01
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				#money_value_dinar_omanian_rial > 0
				dinar_omanian_rial_c_global_stokpile > 0
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = dropdown_menu_currency
				target = global_var:currency_dropdown_dinar_omanian_rial_01
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				#money_value_dinar_qiran > 0
				dinar_qiran_c_global_stokpile > 0
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = dropdown_menu_currency
				target = global_var:currency_dropdown_dinar_qiran_01
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				#money_value_dinar_saudi_riyal > 0
				dinar_saudi_riyal_c_global_stokpile > 0
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = dropdown_menu_currency
				target = global_var:currency_dropdown_dinar_saudi_riyal_01
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				#money_value_dinar_serbian_dinar > 0
				dinar_serbian_dinar_c_global_stokpile > 0
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = dropdown_menu_currency
				target = global_var:currency_dropdown_dinar_serbian_dinar_01
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				#money_value_dinar_tunisian_dinar > 0
				dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_global_stokpile > 0
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = dropdown_menu_currency
				target = global_var:currency_dropdown_dinar_tunisian_dinar_01
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {

				#money_value_rupee_indian_rupee > 0
				rupee_indian_rupee_c_global_stokpile > 0
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = dropdown_menu_currency
				target = global_var:currency_dropdown_rupee_indian_rupee_01
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				#money_value_rupee_indonesian_rupiah > 0
				rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_global_stokpile > 0
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = dropdown_menu_currency
				target = global_var:currency_dropdown_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_01
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				#money_value_spe_baht > 0
				spe_baht_c_global_stokpile > 0
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = dropdown_menu_currency
				target = global_var:currency_dropdown_spe_baht_01
			}
		}

selection_changed_for_currency = {
	scope = country

	saved_scopes = { currency_dropdown_option }

	effect = {
	    switch = {
			trigger = scope:currency_dropdown_option
			flag:dinar_01 = {
				set_variable = {
					name = currency_selection
					value = flag:dinar_01
				}
				choose_currency_type_reset_all = yes
				set_variable = {
					name = choose_currency_type_dinar
					value = 1
				}
			}
			flag:dinar_algerian_dinar_01 = {
				set_variable = {

update_currency_stored_liste = {
	effect = {
		clear_global_variable_list = stored_currency

		#dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_dinar_state > 0
					stockpiling_dinar_state < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency
				target = global_var:currency_stored_dinar_02
			}
		}
		#dinar_algerian_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state > 0
					stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency
				target = global_var:currency_stored_dinar_algerian_dinar_02
			}
		}
		#dinar_iraqi_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state > 0
					stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency
				target = global_var:currency_stored_dinar_iraqi_dinar_02
			}
		}
		#dinar_libyan_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state > 0
					stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency
				target = global_var:currency_stored_dinar_libyan_dinar_02
			}
		}
		#dinar_moroccan_dirham
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state > 0
					stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency
				target = global_var:currency_stored_dinar_moroccan_dirham_02
			}
		}
		#dinar_omanian_rial
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state > 0
					stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency
				target = global_var:currency_stored_dinar_omanian_rial_02
			}
		}
		#dinar_qiran

			limit = {

			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency

		}
		#dinar_serbian_dinar

		}

			}
		}
		#dollar_united_states_dollar
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state > 0
					stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency
				target = global_var:currency_stored_dollar_united_states_dollar_02
			}
		}
		#eco_ariary
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_eco_ariary_state > 0
					stockpiling_eco_ariary_state < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency

			}
		}
		#eco_central_african_eco
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state > 0
					stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency
				target = global_var:currency_stored_eco_central_african_eco_02

		#rupee_indian_rupee
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state > 0
					stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency
				target = global_var:currency_stored_rupee_indian_rupee_02
			}
		}
		#rupee_indonesian_rupiah
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state > 0
					stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency
				target = global_var:currency_stored_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_02
			}
		}
		#spe_baht
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_spe_baht_state > 0
					stockpiling_spe_baht_state < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency
				target = global_var:currency_stored_spe_baht_02
			}
		}
		#spe_dong
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_spe_dong_state > 0
					stockpiling_spe_dong_state < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency
				target = global_var:currency_stored_spe_dong_02
			}
		}
		#spe_drachma
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_spe_drachma_state > 0
					stockpiling_spe_drachma_state < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency
				target = global_var:currency_stored_spe_drachma_02
			}
		}
		#spe_korean_won
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state > 0
					stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency
				target = global_var:currency_stored_spe_korean_won_02
			}
		}
		#spe_latvian_lats
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state > 0
					stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency
				target = global_var:currency_stored_spe_latvian_lats_02
			}
		}
		#spe_lithuanian_litas
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state > 0
					stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency
				target = global_var:currency_stored_spe_lithuanian_litas_02
			}
		}
		#spe_peseta
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_spe_peseta_state > 0
					stockpiling_spe_peseta_state < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency

			}
		}
		#spe_ruble
		if = {
			limit = {

				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency

			}
		}
		#spe_uni
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_spe_uni_state > 0
					stockpiling_spe_uni_state < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency
				target = global_var:currency_stored_spe_uni_02
			}
		}
		#spe_yen
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_spe_yen_state > 0
					stockpiling_spe_yen_state < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency
				target = global_var:currency_stored_spe_yen_02
			}
		}
		#spe_yuan
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_spe_yuan_state > 0
					stockpiling_spe_yuan_state < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency

			}
		}
		#spe_zloti
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_spe_zloti_state > 0
					stockpiling_spe_zloti_state < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency
				target = global_var:currency_stored_spe_zloti_02
			}
		}
		#thaler_hannoveraner_thaler
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state > 0
					stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state < 0

			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {

			}
		}
		#thaler_prussian_thaler
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state > 0
					stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency
				target = global_var:currency_stored_thaler_prussian_thaler_02

		#thaler_saxon_thaler
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {

	}
}

# ████████╗██████╗  █████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗███████╗███████╗██████╗          ██████╗  ██████╗ ██╗     ██████╗      ████████╗ ██████╗          ██████╗
# ╚══██╔══╝██╔══██╗██╔══██╗████╗  ██║██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔══██╗        ██╔════╝ ██╔═══██╗██║     ██╔══██╗     ╚══██╔══╝██╔═══██╗        ██╔════╝
#    ██║   ██████╔╝███████║██╔██╗ ██║███████╗█████╗  █████╗  ██████╔╝        ██║  ███╗██║   ██║██║     ██║  ██║        ██║   ██║   ██║        ██║
#    ██║   ██╔══██╗██╔══██║██║╚██╗██║╚════██║██╔══╝  ██╔══╝  ██╔══██╗        ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║     ██║  ██║        ██║   ██║   ██║        ██║
#    ██║   ██║  ██║██║  ██║██║ ╚████║███████║██║     ███████╗██║  ██║███████╗╚██████╔╝╚██████╔╝███████╗██████╔╝███████╗██║   ╚██████╔╝███████╗╚██████╗
#    ╚═╝   ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝╚═╝     ╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝╚═════╝ ╚══════╝╚═╝    ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝ ╚═════╝

# ███████╗██║ ╚████║   ██║   ██║  ██║██║  ██║███████╗███████╗██████╔╝██║  ██║██║ ╚████║██║  ██╗███████╗╚██████╔╝╚██████╔╝███████╗██████╔╝███████╗

# ██╔══██╗██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔══██╗██║   ██║██╔════╝██╔════╝
# ██████╔╝█████╗  ███████╗█████╗  ██████╔╝██║   ██║█████╗  ███████╗
# ██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ╚════██║██╔══╝  ██╔══██╗╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══╝  ╚════██║
# ██║  ██║███████╗███████║███████╗██║  ██║ ╚████╔╝ ███████╗███████║
# ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝  ╚═══╝  ╚══════╝╚══════╝

################################################################################################
################################################################################################
################################################################################################
################################################################################################


transfer_gold_to_central_bank_gold_reserves_increase = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = transfer_gold_to_central_bank_gold_reserves
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = transfer_gold_to_central_bank_gold_reserves
				add = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}
transfer_gold_to_central_bank_gold_reserves_reduce = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = transfer_gold_to_central_bank_gold_reserves
				var:transfer_gold_to_central_bank_gold_reserves > 10000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = transfer_gold_to_central_bank_gold_reserves
				subtract = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}

################################

################################

transfer_gold_to_central_bank_gold_reserves = {
	effect = {
		add_treasury = {
			value = 0
			subtract = var:transfer_gold_to_central_bank_gold_reserves
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
					#is_homeland_of_country_cultures = ROOT
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					add = root.var:transfer_gold_to_central_bank_gold_reserves
				}

			}
		}
	}
}

################################

################################

transfer_gold_to_central_bank_gold_reserves_visible = {
	is_valid = {
		gold_reserves_var > var:transfer_gold_to_central_bank_gold_reserves
	}
}
